La socia pertenece al banco comunal  “SR. DE TAYANCANI”;  El banco comunal está ubicado en el distrito de Ocongate perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Isabel; La socia es conviviente y tiene  2 hijos ella se dedica a la venta de comidas, la socia prepara diferentes platos de comidas y las vende en forma ambulatoria, ella elabora sus platos típicos caseros y los lleva envolviendo el recipiente que en este caso es una olla con varias telas de yute grueso para mantener el calor y sobre una silla vende en sus platos descartables y le renta muy bien algunos fines de semana, la socia elabora sus platos muy temprano por la mañana y junto a sus menores hijos los lleva a vender; La socia desea a futuro poner un restaurante y tener a alguien que le apoye con la cocina y la atención de las mezas y poder ahorrarse todo el trajín de llevar las ollas en sus espalda y sus sillas de plástico, los utensilios a vender todos los días. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de insumos para elaborar sus comiditas caseras y continuar de este modo incrementando sus ganancias.

La socia agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete en cumplir con el pago de su cuota en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the community bank "Sr. De Tayancan".  The community bank is located in the Ocongate district of the Quispicanchis province and department of Cusco.

The member is Mrs. Isabel, she lives with a partner and has 2 children.  She makes a living selling food.  She prepares various food dishes and sells them as a street vendor.  She makes her homemade, typical dishes and takes them, covering the pot with various cloths of thick burlap to maintain them hot, and sells them from a chair in disposable containers. Some weekends she does very well.  She makes her dishes very early in the morning and takes them to sell with the help of her children.  In the future she would like to open a restaurant and have help with the cooking and waiting on tables, and save herself the wear on her back of carrying her pots, plastic chairs and utensils every day.  The member is requesting this loan to invest in the purchase of supplies for the making of her homemade meals and in this way to be able to continue to increasing her income.

The member is thankful and appreciates the loan granted through this process and promises to comply with the payments in accordance with the agreed upon schedule.

loans.use: Invest in the purchase of supplies.

loans.name: Moises Wilber

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal  “SR. DE TAYANCANI”;  El banco comunal está ubicado en el distrito de Ocongate perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Moises; El socio es casado y tiene  3 hijos el socio se dedica a elaborar adobes el es maestro de obras, es considerado obrero, el socio  en su vivienda en el canchón prepara el adobe con tierra, arcilla, paja y los pisa el trabaja junto a su conyugue y pisan la mezcla para luego ponerlo en cubetas, el socio espera que se amolden y los retira de la cubeta dejándolos alineados para que sequen y luego proceder a vender los adobes para las diferentes construcciones en el pueblo. El socio desea comprar materiales para la elaboración de adobes. El socio solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales.

El socio agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete en cumplir con el pago de su cuota en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Moises is a member of the community bank "Sr. de Tayancani", located in the Ocongate district in the province of Quispicanchis and the department of Cusco.  

Moises is married and has three children.  He makes adobe bricks and is a master builder.  He is considered hard-working.  In an area of his home, he prepares the adobe using earth, clay, and straw.  He works with his wife to compress the mixture into trays.  He waits until they take their shape and removes them from the trays so they can dry.  Afterward, he sells them to different buildings in town.

He would like to purchase materials to make adobe bricks.  He is asking for this loan to purchase the materials.

Moises is thankful for this loan and promises to make his payments on time.

loans.use: Purchase materials to make adobe bricks

loans.name: Florencio

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal  “SR. DE TAYANCANI”;  El banco comunal está ubicado en el distrito de Ocongate perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Florencio; El socio es conviviente y tiene 6 hijos, el socio es maestro constructor, el trabaja en todo tipo de obras de construcción y en el pueblo generalmente lo buscan para este tipo de trabajos, el socio todos los domingos  apoya a su economía alternando con el servicio de trici taxi (son unas carretas sin techo acondicionadas a las motos). El socio trabaja solo los días domingos para aumentar la semana. El socio desea el préstamo para invertir en su hogar en la compra de productos básicos para el hogar lo cual el los ira pagando con su trabajo. El socio solicita el préstamo para uso personal.  

El socio agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete en cumplir con el pago de su cuota en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Florencio is a member of the “Sr. de Tayancani” community bank which is located in Ocongate district, in Quispicanchis province, in Cusco department.

Florencio lives with his common-law wife and has 6 children.  He is a master builder and works on all kinds of construction jobs.  In his town they generally seek him out for this type of work.  Every Sunday he supports his family's finances by also providing a service in his 'trici taxi' (a cart without roof which is attached to the back of a motorbike).  He works Sundays to supplement his week's work.  He would like this loan to invest in his home by buying basic products which he will pay for through his work.  He is requesting the loan for personal use.

He is grateful for the loan and appreciates it.  He pledges to make his repayments in a timely manner.

loans.use: To buy basic products for his household

loans.name: Dolores Del Rocio

texts.es:
La Señora Dolores G. es socia del banco comunal Mujeres Luchadoras, vive en la Ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es conocida como  Santa Ana de los 4 Ríos, su cultura y tradiciones hacen de esta una ciudad encantadora, tiene  gran variedad en su gastronomía, su gente es amble y muy cordial.

La Señora. Dolores tiene 41 años, es casada y tiene 2 hijos de 21 y 12 años de edad, su primer hijo se dedica a trabajar y ayuda en la economía del hogar y su segunda hija   estudia en un colegio de la ciudad. Su esposo es de profesión chofer y labora como chofer particular, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive en casa de herederos.
 
Doña Dolores labora en su tienda de abarrotes, actividad que viene desempeñando hace 5 años, abre su tienda desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 10 de la noche y de domingo a domingo.

Se encuentra reingresando al banco comunal ya que fue socia hace un año atrás, el dinero de su crédito lo va  a invertir en la compra de mas productos para su tienda. Su sueño es tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Sra. Dolores G. is a member of the Communal Bank “Mujeres Luchadoras” (Fighting Women) and lives in the city of Cuenca, which is also known as “Santa Ana de los 4 Ríos”. The city is known for its culture and traditions that make it enchanting, its wide variety of cuisines, and its warm and friendly people.

Sra. Dolores is 41 years old, married, and has two children (ages 21 and 12). Her older child works and helps with the household expenses. The younger child, a daughter, attends high school in the city. Her husband is a professional driver and works as a private chauffeur. She does not have her own home since her family currently lives at the house of a deceased relative.

Doña Dolores works at her own grocery store, a business she started five years ago. She opens her store at 8am and closes at 10pm, Sunday through Sunday. Dolores is returning to the Communal Bank after leaving the group a year ago. The money from her loan will be invested in the purchase of more products for her store. Her dream is to have her own home.

loans.use: Purchase merchandise for her store

loans.name: Lorenzo

texts.es: Lorenzo, de 26 años, vive con su mamá Julia y su abuelita Alicia. En unión familiar ellos viven en su casa propia ubicada en la comunidad nativa de Ñagazu (selva central peruana). Este dichoso y emprendedor joven, se dedica a la agricultura; sus principales sembrío son de plátano, café, los que cuida y aplica abono constantemente. Pero como buen agricultor él práctica todo lo que aprende en sus clases de Agronomía, su mayor objetivo, desea terminar con éxito su carrera profesional, para poder abrir una consultoría y así ayudar a los agriculturas de la ciudad de Villa Rica. En todos estos 3 años de trabajo arduo, aprendió a comercializar sus cosechas, y los comerciantes intermediarios conocen de la buena calidad de sus cultivos, por ello en cada cosecha visitan sus terrenos agrícolas para comprarlos. Esté es el quinto crédito con MFP, y como socio antiguo de su banco comunal, agradece el apoyo que recibió durante todo este tiempo. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará varios sacos de abono para esparcirlos en sus sembríos de plátano.
texts.en:
Lorenzo, age 26, lives with his mother Julia and his grandmother Alicia. This family lives in their own home located in the indigenous community of Ñagazu (in the central Peruvian jungle). This fortunate and enterprising young man is a farmer who grows mainly bananas and coffee. He cares for these crops and applies fertilizer on a regular basis. Like any good farmer, he practices everything he learned from his agronomy classes. His greatest goal is to successfully finish his professional degree so that he can open a consultancy practice and help farmers in the city of Villa Rica. After three years of hard work, he learned how to sell his crops and became known among the commercial brokers for the quality of his products. During each harvest they visit his farmland to buy his crops.

This is his fifth loan with MFP. Being a long-time member of his Communal Bank, he is grateful for the support he has received during this time. The loan he is requesting will be used to buy several sacks of compost to apply on his banana crops.

loans.use: Purchase sacks of compost

loans.name: Fanny Beatriz

texts.es:
La Señorita. Fanny A. es socia del banco comunal Mujeres Luchadoras, vive en la Ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es conocida como  Santa Ana de los 4 Ríos, su cultura y tradiciones hacen de esta una ciudad encantadora, tiene gran variedad en su gastronomía, su gente es amable y muy cordial.

Nuestra socia es soltera y tiene 27 años de edad, vive en casa de sus padres, su papá es jubilado y su mamá se dedica  a la cría de animales.

La Señorita Fanny estudia en la universidad la carrera de Psicología Infantil, esta en cuarto año, en su tiempo libre se dedica a ha realizar recorridos llevando y trayendo niños de las escuelas.

Este es su primer crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y su prima fue quien la invito a formar parte de este grupo, su crédito lo va  a invertir en la compra de repuestos para su vehiculo. Su meta es realizar un centro de recreación para los niños que van con sus madres al mercado.
texts.en:
Srta. Fanny A. is a member of the Communal Bank “Mujeres Luchadoras” (Fighting Women) and lives in the city of Cuenca, which is also known as “Santa Ana de los 4 Ríos”. The city is known for its culture and traditions that make it an enchanting city, its wide variety of cuisines, and its warm and friendly people. Fanny is 27 years old and single. She lives at home with her parents. Her father is retired while her mother raises animals.

Srta. Fanny is a university student who is in her fourth year toward earning a degree in child psychology. During her free time, she drives children to and from school.

This is her first loan with the Communal Bank. Her cousin invited her to join the group. The loan will be invested in the purchase of spare parts for her vehicle. Her goal is to open a recreation center where children can go while their mothers are at the market.

loans.use: Purchase spare parts for her vehicle

loans.name: Blanca Rosa

texts.es:
Blanca tiene la edad de 46 años, es una madre muy dedicada a su familia como a su trabajo. Casada, siendo su esposo capitán.
Hoy en día trabaja en una empresa privada en el área de contabilidad, en donde lleva varios años laborando, en donde cuida su trabajo ya que hay muchas personas hoy en día que no cuentan con esta bendición.
Atreves de este financiamiento hará posible la construcción de un muro, logrando reguardar mas su vivienda. Comprara materiales de construcción como: piedra, arena, cemento, hierro y comenzar.
Contenta ya que esta mejora la está logrando por medio de los financiamientos que es de gran beneficio a los sectores de pocos recursos, el cual estos se pagan a través de plazos.
texts.en:
Blanca, age 46, is a mother who is very dedicated to both her family and her work. She is married and her husband is a captain. Today Blanca works for a private company in the accounting department. She has been working for several years and takes great care in her job since many people today are not as fortunate.

This loan will be used for the construction of a wall that will provide additional protection for her home. Blanca will purchase building materials such as stone, sand, cement, and iron needed to begin the work. She is pleased that this improvement is possible with the help of loans, which are a great benefit in low-income areas and can be repaid in installments.

loans.use: Purchase construction materials to build a wall

loans.name: Alfredo

texts.es: Alfredo, de 54 años, es un padre soltero y trabajador. Él tiene 4 hijos, pero solo vive con 3 de ellos: Efraín, de 8, Elba, de 16 y Duler, de 13 años de edad. En unión familiar ellos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en la comunidad nativa de Ñagazu (selva central peruana). La siembra de café, plátanos, caigua y rocoto, es su principal actividad. Ya tiene 30 años dedicándose a la agricultura, sus años de experiencia hicieron que negocie de buena manera sus cosechas, pero el grano de café, lo comercializa en la asociación de agricultores de su localidad. Lo que más le molesta a Alfredo, son las temporadas donde la rancha, que es un tipo de hongo, malogran sus cafetales, pero como sabe que toda dificultad tienen su recompensa, le satisface saber que en la comunidad, se puede cosechar café durante todo el año, ya que en altura, la siembra es más efectiva. Por ello más adelante desea negociar su producción de café con las principales empresas exportadoras. Es el tercer crédito con MFP, y como socio nuevo de su banco comunal, se sienta dichoso con el trabajo que viene asiendo, ya que se siente desarrollado y con apoyo para seguir saliendo adelante. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará abono orgánico y fertilizante orgánico como guano de isla, para sus sembríos de café.
texts.en:
Alfredo, who is 54, is a single father and worker. He has 4 children, but he lives with only 3 of them: Efraín, who is 8, Elba, 16, and Duler, 13. They live as a family group in their own home, located in the native community of Ñagazu, in the central Peruvain forest. Planting coffee, bananas, pumpkins, and peppers is his principal activity. He has already worked in agriculture for 30 years, and his years of experience mean that he manages his crops will, but he sells the coffee beans through the agricultural association in his district. What bothers Alfredo most are the seasons when the "rancha," which is a type of fungus, spoils his coffee plantings, but he knows that every difficulty has its recompense. He is satisfied that in his community, coffee can be harvested all year, since at that altitude, planting is more effective. In the future he wants to negotiate to sell his coffee to the principal exporters. 

This is his third loan with MFP, and as a new member of his community bank, he feels happy with the work that it is doing, since he feels that he has made progress and has the support to continue advancing. With the loan that he is applying for, he will buy organic compost and fertilizer, such as guano from the islands, for his coffee plantings.

loans.use: Buy organic fertilizer and guano from the islands for his coffee plantings.

loans.name: Paula

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal  “SR. DE TAYANCANI”;  El banco comunal está ubicado en el distrito de Ocongate perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Paula; La socia es casada y tiene  6 hijos ella se dedica a  apoyar a su hija que tiene un restaurante en el pueblo, la socia también vende carne en el mercado en un stand, ella trabaja desde hace 8 años vendiendo carne y ahora ayuda a su hija la socia también solía vender granos secos y verduras pero su hija ahora le ha pedido que le apoye con su restaurante y que no haga nada más ya que la socia trabajó mucho desde los 10 años de edad. La socia desea el préstamo para apoyar a su hija con un poco de capital, ahora ellas pagaran el préstamo con lo que les rentará el restaurante. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en el restaurante de su hija.

La socia agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete en cumplir con el pago de su cuota en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Paula is a member of the community bank "Sr. de Tayancani", which is located in the Ocongate district in the province of Quispicanchis and the department of Cusco.

Paula is married and has six children.  She works with her daughter who has a restaurant in town.  She also sells meat in the market at a stand.  She has been selling meat for eight years and now she helps her daughter.  She would also like to sell grains and vegetables but her daughter has asked her to help with the restaurant and not do other work because she has worked so hard since she was 10 years old.  

Paula wants this loan to support her daughter with some working capital, and they will pay the loan with the profits from the restaurant.  She is asking for this loan to invest in her daughter's restaurant.

She is thankful for this loan and promises to make all of her payments on time.

loans.use: Invest in her daughter's restaurant

loans.name: Narcisa Elena

texts.es:
La Señora Narcisa J. es socia del banco comunal Mujeres Luchadoras, vive en la Ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es conocida como  Santa Ana de los 4 Ríos, su cultura y tradiciones hacen de esta una ciudad encantadora, tiene gran variedad en su gastronomía, su gente es amable y muy cordial.

Doña Narcisa es comerciante de ropa hace 15 años, actividad que la realiza ambulantemente y labora solo un día a la semana, vende todo tipo de ropa usada, el resto de su tiempo pasa en casa al cuidado de sus hijos, también es profesional en la área de la belleza y labora solo los fines de semana en el gabinete de una amiga.
 
La Señora Narcisa tiene 39 años, es casada y tiene 4 hijos  de 21, 16, 13, y 6 años de edad, su primera hija estudia en la Universidad, su segunda y tercera hija  estudian en el colegio y su ultimo hijo en una escuela de la ciudad, su esposo es propietario de un taller de mecánica, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven arrendando. 

Nuestra socia se encuentra en su quinto crédito que realiza en el  banco comunal y ha sido su cuñada quien le ha invitado a formar parte de este grupo. El dinero de su crédito lo va  a invertir en la compra de más ropa para la temporada navideña. Su meta es  tener su propio gabinete de belleza.
texts.en:
Narcisa J. is a member of the community bank Mujeres Luchadoras.  She lives in the city of Cuenca, which is known as Santa Ana of the Four Rivers.  Its culture and traditions make this a charming city.  It has a variety of cuisines, and the people are nice and friendly.

Narcisa has been a clothing saleswoman for 15 years.  She sells all types of used clothing on the street one day a week.  She spends the rest of her time at home caring for her children.  She is also a beauty professional and works on the weekends in her friend's shop.

Narcisa is 39 years old, married, and has four children, who are 21, 16, 13, and 6 years old.  Her oldest daughter studies at the university, her second and third daughters are in high school, and her youngest child attends a public school.  Her husband is the owner of a mechanic shop.  They don't own their own home, so they rent a home.

This is her fifth loan with her community bank.  Her sister-in-law invited her to form part of the group.  She plans to use the loan to purchase more clothing for the Christmas season.  

Her goal is to have her own beauty salon.

loans.use: Purchase used clothing

loans.name: Cesar

texts.es: César, de 24 años, es un hombre soltero y trabajador, que vive en compañía de sus padres y sus 5 hermanos. En unión familiar, ellos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en la comunidad nativa de Ñagazu (selva central peruana). Esté ambicioso joven, hace apenas 3 años que emprendió su propio negocio, y está dichoso de ayudar a su familia a salir adelante. Con el terreno que le heredó sus padres, comenzó a sembrar café, el cual abona, cultiva y cuida todos los días, y después de cada cosecha los entrega a la asociación de agricultores de su localidad, los cuales venden el grano a un mayor precio. Pero César, tienen otras aspiraciones, que caminan paralelo a su producción, ya que él estudia Agronomía, en un instituto reconocido del país, él desea más adelante terminar su carrera profesional, para poder asesorar a los pobladores de su comunidad, y así lograr la excelencia que tanto busca. Esté es el quinto crédito con MFP, y agradece a los integrantes de su banco comunal, los que le apoyan y le ayudan a salir adelante. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará abono orgánico y fertilizantes naturales, para su sembrío de café.
texts.en:
César is 24 years old and is a hardworking single man who lives with his parents and five siblings.  The family lives in their own house located in the native community of Nagazu in the central Peruvian jungle.  

About three years ago, this ambitious young man started his own business and is helping his family get ahead.  With the land he inherited from his parents, he began to cultivate coffee.  He fertilizes, cultivates, and cares for his crop every day.  After each harvest, he brings the coffee to the agricultural association in his town, which sells it at a better price.

César has other dreams that work in parallel with his crops.  Since he studies agriculture at a well-known school, he wants to complete degree and advise the residents of his community and achieve the excellence that he is looking for.  

This is his fifth credit with MFP and he thanks all the members of his community bank because they support each other and help each other get ahead.  With this loan, he wants to purchase compost and natural fertilizers for his coffee crop.

loans.use: Purchase compost and fertilizers for his coffee crop

loans.name: Tito Richard

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “UNIDOS PARA EL TRIUNFO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Tito; el tiene 43 años de edad y es casado y tiene 3 hijos; el socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de filmaciones y ediciones para todo tipo de eventos matrimonios,cumpleaños,aniversarios entre otros,a la vez el socio trabaja para una empresa privada en el area de administración.   

El socio solicita el préstamo para la implementación de su negocio.

El socio agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Tito is a member of the community bank "Unidos para el Triunfo" [United for Success], located in the district of Cusco in the province of Cusco in the department of Cusco. 

Tito is 43 years old, married, and has three children.  He balances his daily activities with a business filming and editing all types of events: weddings, birthdays, and anniversaries, among others.  He currently works for a private company in the area of administration.

He is asking for this loan to begin his business.

He is thankful for everyone who will make this dream possible through this loan, and he promises to make all of his payments on time.

loans.use: Start a business filming events

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “UNIDOS PARA EL TRIUNFO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco  y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Elizabeth; ella tiene 43 años de edad, separada y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de fabricación de velas ella lo fabrica en su casa y luego lo distribuye a sus clientes y también lo exibe en su tienda que seencuentra ubicado por el centro de la ciudad,ahora la socia se encuentra muy entusiasmada ya que se acerca las fiestas navideñas y es donde tiene mas venta. 

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de insumos para la fabricación de velas como las parafina.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Elizabeth is a member of the community bank "Unidos para el Triunfo" [United for Success], located in the district of Cusco in the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.  

She is 43 years old, separated, and has one child.  She balances her daily activities with a candle making business.  She makes candles in her home and distributes them to her customers and also sells them in her store located in the center of the city.  She is very excited because the Christmas holidays are approaching and she has more sales.

She is asking for this loan to purchase materials to create candles, like paraffin.  

Elizabeth thanks everyone who is part of making this dream possible and she promises to make all of her payments on time.

loans.use: Purchase materials to make candles, like paraffin.

loans.name: Lydia

texts.es: Lydia, de 42 años, convive con Mario, de 42 años. Ella tienen 5 hijos de otro compromiso, pero ahora solo vive con 3 de ellos: Jessica, de 19, Ingrid, de 16 y Hans, de 14 años. En unión familiar ellos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en la comunidad nativa de Ñagazu (selva central peruana). Hace 4 años que se dedica a la agricultura, sus principales sembríos son el café, rocoto y caigua, los que después de cada cosecha, los comercializa en la asociación de agricultores de su localidad; pero la producción de rocoto los comercializa en la capital del país, donde tiene mayor demanda y buena acogida. Pero según afirma Lydia, en épocas de invierno se puede sembrar caigua, por ello ahora invertirá en sus cultivos de café, los cuales son comerciables en todo el año. Por ello más adelante desea comprar más terrenos agrícolas, donde pueda sembrar mayor cantidad de café. Esté es el cuarto crédito con MFP, y se siente en familia, ya que los socios de su banco comunal, son personas responsable y muy trabajadoras. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará de abono orgánico y fertilizantes naturales, que esparcirá en sus plantaciones de café.
texts.en:
Lydia is 42 years old and lives with Mario, age 42. She has five children from a previous relationship, but only three of them still live with her: Jessica (age 19), Ingrid (age 16), and Hans (age 14). She and her family live in their own home located in the indigenous community of Ñagazu (in the central Peruvian jungle). Lydia has been farming for four years, growing primarily coffee, rocoto peppers, and caigua (a type of gourd that is used for medicinal purposes). After each harvest, she sells her products except the rocoto peppers at the local farmers association. The rocoto peppers are sold in the national capital where they are popular and in high demand. According to Lydia, she is able to grow caigua during the winter season but now she must invest in her coffee crop that is sold every year. In order to progress further, she wants to acquire more farmland so that she can grow more coffee.

This is her fourth loan with MFP. She feels the members of her Communal Bank are like family since they are responsible and hardworking people. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy organic compost and natural fertilizers to apply on her coffee crops.

loans.use: Purchase organic compost & fertilizers

loans.name: Mario Anibal

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “UNIDOS PARA EL TRIUNFO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr.Mario; el tiene 49 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; el socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de estudio fotográfico, el socio trabaja conjuntamente con su esposa ya varios años atrás, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de San Sebastián. De esta manera el socio saca a su familia adelante.  

El socio solicita el préstamo para la compra de 1 cámara digital y para el mantenimiento de algunas maquinas.

El socio agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago 
de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Sr. Mario is a member of the Communal Bank “Unidos Para El Triunfo” (United for the Triumph), which is located in the district, province, and department of Cusco.

He is 49 years old, in a common law marriage, and has one child.  Mario divides his time between his daily activities and his photography studio.  He and his wife have been working together for several years.  His business is located in the district of San Sebastián.  Through this activity, he is able to move his family forward.  He is requesting a loan in order to purchase one digital camera and pay for maintenance of his other machines.

Mario is grateful to those who helped fulfill his dream and promises to complete his payments by the established deadlines.

loans.use: Purchase a digital camera & pay for machine maintenance

loans.name: Bertha

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal  “SR. DE TAYANCANI”;  El banco comunal está ubicado en el distrito de Ocongate perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Bertha; La socia es casada y tiene  6 hijos ella se dedica a la venta de comida de forma ambulatoria, la socia vende comiditas caseras como papas sancochadas con huevo sancochado y ají; nabo picado con choclo (maíz dulce) llamado nabojaucha, nombre en quechua. La socia lleva en ollitas envueltas en mantas gruesas para mantener el calor de sus platos y vende por porciones en la esquina de la plaza del pueblo. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de insumos para elaborar sus comiditas.

La socia agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete en cumplir con el pago de su cuota en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Sra. Bertha is a member of the Communal Bank “Sr. De Tayancani”, which is located in the District of Ocongate, Quispicanchis Province, Department of Cusco.

She is married and has six children. Bertha sells food as a street vendor. She offers small meals such as boiled potatoes with eggs and peppers; and a dish called “nabojaucha” in Quechua that consists of chopped turnip greens and sweet corn. Bertha covers her pots in thick blankets to keep her dishes warm and then sell her meals from the corner of the city plaza. She is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of supplies for preparing food.

Bertha is grateful and values the loan that has been provided to her. Therefore, she promises to complete her payments by the established deadlines.

loans.use: Purchase supplies for preparing the food that she sells

loans.name: Marisol

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “UNIDOS PARA ELTRIUNFO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco  y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Marisol; ella tiene 41 años de edad, casada y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de adornos de navidad, la socia viaja hasta Juliaca  y Puno para comprar su mercadería para luego distribuirlo a sus clientes que se encuentran en el Molino. 

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de mercadería para su negocio. 

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Sra. Marisol is a member of the Communal Bank “Unidos Para El Triunfo” (United for the Triumph), which is located in the district, province, and department of Cusco.

She is 41 years old, married, and has three children. Marisol divides her time between her daily activities and her business of selling Christmas decorations. She travels to Juliaca and Puno to acquire her merchandise and then sells it to her customers in Molino. Marisol is requesting a loan to buy more merchandise for her business.

She is grateful to those who helped fulfill her dream and promises to complete her payments by the established deadlines.

loans.use: Acquire more merchandise

loans.name: Juan Leonard

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “UNIDOS PARA EL TRIUNFO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
El socio es el Sr. Juan; el tiene 46 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; el socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de crianza de animales como cuyes y gallinas y luego lo distribuye a los mercados y tiendas. A la vez el socio trabaja para el sector privado, el socio es una persona muy emprendedora y de esta manera saca a su familia adelante. 

El socio solicita el préstamo para la compra de insumos para su negocio como maíz,purina entre otros.

El socio agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Sr. Juan is a member of the Communal Bank “Unidos Para El Triunfo” (United for the Triumph), which is located in the district, province, and department of Cusco.

He is 46 years old, in a common law marriage, and has two children. Juan divides his time between his daily activities and his business of raising animals such as chickens and guinea pigs. He then distributes the animals to markets and stores. Since he works in the private sector, Juan is an enterprising person who tries to move his family forward. He is requesting a loan to purchase supplies for his business such as corn, animal feed, and other items.

Juan is grateful to those who helped fulfill his dream and promises to complete his payments by the established deadlines.

loans.use: Purchase supplies such as corn, animal feed, and other items

loans.name: Eulalia

texts.es: Eulalia, de 34 años, convive con José, de 37 años. Ambos tienen, 4 hijos, todos menores de edad. En unión familiar ellos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de San Pedro de Cajas. Está emprendedora mujer, hace tan solo 4 años, que emprendió la siembra de maca. Primero vendía su producción a los intermediarios que trasladaban a la ciudad de Junín, al ver que la maca que producía era de buena calidad, hace 2 años que Eulalia, recibió la propuesta de vender su producción a una empresa procesadora de bebidas a base de maca en la capital, desde entonces comenzó su inversión en la mejora de la calidad de su producto, el cual le genera ganancias de 9 mil a 10 mil nuevos soles anuales. Por ello está planeando abrir su propia empresa de procesadora de maca, con el cual pueda expandir su negocio y por ende generar mejores ganancias, en corto plazo. Este es el segundo crédito con MFP, y espera salir adelante junto a los integrantes de su banco comunal, al cual augura muchos éxitos. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará 16 kilos de semillas de maca, que utilizará en sus 4 hectáreas de terreno agrícola. Cada kilo oscila entre los 180 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Eulalia is 34 years old and lives with José, age 37. They have four children, all of whom are minors. This family lives in their own home located in the town of San Pedro de Cajas. Eulalia is an enterprising woman who began growing “maca” (a type of root vegetable) four years ago. At first her products were sold through middlemen who travel to the city of Junín where the maca that is produced is of high quality. Two years ago, Eulalia received a proposal to sell her harvest to a processing company that makes beverages out of maca. Since then she began investing to improve the quality of her product and now generates revenue between 9,000 to 10,000 PEN per year. For this reason, she plans to open her own maca processing enterprise so that she can expand her business and earn higher profits in the short term.

This is her second loan with MFP. Eulalia hopes that she and the other members of her Communal Bank can move forward together and achieve great success. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy 16 kilos of maca seeds for planting on four hectares of farmland. Each kilo can fluctuate up to 180 PEN.

loans.use: Purchase 16 kilos of maca seeds

loans.name: Victor Hugo

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “UNIDOS PARA EL TRIUNFO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
El socio es el Sr. Víctor; el tiene 38 años de edad y es soltero; el socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de artesanía el restaura obras de arte en  madera y marcos dorados también restaura imágenes, a la vez el socio tiene su consultorio dental es odontólogo de profesión.

El socio solicita el préstamo para la compra de material para su negocio.

El socio agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Víctor is a member of the “Unidos para el Triunfo” (United for Victory) community bank which is located in Cusco district, in the province and department of the same name.

Víctor is 38 years old and single.  He divides his time between his daily activities and his handicrafts business.  He restores wooden works of art and golden frames.  He also restores pictures.  At the same time he has a dental office as he is a dentist by profession.

He is requesting this loan to buy material for his business.  He is grateful to those who will take part in his dream by funding his loan and pledges to make his repayments in a timely manner.

loans.use: To buy material for his business

loans.name: Nataly

texts.es: Nataly, de 20 años, es una mujer soltera y trabajadora, que vive con su mamá Nely, de 52 y su papá Ángel, de 56 años. En unión familiar ellos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de San Pedro de Cajas. Está emprendedora joven, hace tan solo 2 años que comenzó con la elaboración de diferentes prendas de vestir a base de lana como: chompas, gorras, mantas, sacos y tapices. Pero para poder obtener mejores ganancias, ella invirtió en el alquiler e implementación de un espacio en la galería del artesano, que queda en la plaza del pueblo, donde cada día festivo, los turistas de todo el país visitan el lugar. Pero el mayor sueño de Nataly, es acabar de estudiar la carrera de Farmacia, donde todas las mañanas estudia con ahínco y empeño. Esté es el segundo crédito con MFP, y como integrante joven de su banco comunal, asegura que no defraudará la confianza depositada en ella, asegurando el pago puntual de sus cuotas. Con el crédito que solicita, invertirá en la compra de tapices y cerámicas para surtir su negocio, y si el dinero le alcanza comprará lana de diferentes colores para tejer sus prendas de vestir.
texts.en:
Nataly is 20 years old.  She is a single and hard-working woman who lives with her mom Nely, 52, and her dad Ángel, 56.  They live in their own home which is in the town of San Pedro de Cajas.  Only two years ago, this enterprising young woman began making garments from wool such as: sweaters, caps, ponchos, jackets and tapestries.  In order to make more profits, she invested in renting and setting up a space in the artisan gallery, which is located in her town square, where tourists from all over the country come to visit every market day.  However, Nataly's biggest dream is to finish her pharmacy degree course.  She studies hard and with determination on this every morning.

This is Nataly's second loan with MFP and, as a young member of her community bank, she assures us that she will not let down those who have placed their trust in her and will make her repayments punctually.  She will use her loan to invest in buying tapestries and ceramics to stock her business and, if the money reaches far enough, she will also buy wool in different colors to make her handicrafts with.

loans.use: To buy tapestries and ceramics to stock her business as well as buying wool

loans.name: Mauro

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “UNIDOS PARA EL TRIUNFO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
El socio es el Sr. Mauro; el tiene 38 años de edad y es soltero; el socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de velas para después distribuirlas a sus clientes en cusco y provincias como Urubamba, ollantaytambo entre otros. 

El socio solicita el préstamo para implementar su negocio.

El socio agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Mauro belongs to the “Unidos para el Triunfo” (United for Victory) community bank which is located in Cusco district, in the province and department of the same name.

Mauro is 38 years old and single.  He divides his time between his daily activities and his business buying and selling candles which he delivers to his customers in Cusco and provinces such as Urubamba, Ollantaytambo and others.

He is requesting this loan to keep his business going.

He would like to thank those who will take part in this dream by funding his loan and pledges to make his repayments in a timely manner.

loans.use: To keep his business going

loans.name: Humberto

texts.es: Humberto, de 18 años, es un joven soltero y trabajador, que vive con su mamá María, de 37 años, y su papá Jesús, de 40 años. En unión familiar ellos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de San Pedro de Cajas. El trabajo al que se dedica Humberto, es la venta de tapices, gorras y chompas, ya tiene 2 años, dedicándose a la venta al por mayor de estos tejidos, los que constantemente vende en el país de Ecuador, a donde viaja una ves al mes, ahí vende los lindos tejidos de los pobladores de esa localidad. Por otro lado Humberto también ayuda a su mamá, en la tienda de venta de lana, donde quiere no solo vender lana natural, sino también, lana sintética de diferentes colores y diseños, los que últimamente son más solicitados y generan buen ingreso. Este es el segundo un crédito con MFP, y espera salir adelante con el apoyo que le brinda su banco comunal, que está integrado por personas honestas y trabajadoras. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará lanas de diferentes colores para surtir su tienda, asimismo comprará más tapices para comercializarlos.
texts.en: Humberto is an 18 year old single young man who is hardworking and lives with his mom, Maria who is 37 years old and his father, Jesus who is 40 years old.  They live together in their own home which is located in San Pedro de Cajas.  Humberto has been selling carpets, hats, and sweaters in bulk for 2 years.  He constantly sells to the country of Ecuador, a place he travels to once a month, once there he sells the cute fabrics of the local inhabitants in the area.  Humberto also helps his mom at the store selling wool, there he not only wants to sell natural wool but also synthetic wool of different colors and designs.  These are generally more sought after and generate bigger revenue.  This is the 2nd loan with MFP, and he hopes to get ahead with the help his communal bank offers which is made up of honest and hard-working people.  With this loan he will purchase different colored wool to stock his store and at the same time also purchase more carpets to sell.

loans.use: Purchase different colored wool and carpets to sell.

loans.name: Marco Antonio

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “UNIDOS PARA EL TRIUNFO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
El socio es el Sr. Marco; el tiene 34 años de edad y es soltero; el socio se dedica al servicio de taxi el trabaja todos los días por las mañanas y por las tardes, y a veces por las noches, el trabaja desde las 05:00am hasta las 08:00pm por las diferentes calles del cusco y de esta manera el sale adelante.

El socio solicita el préstamo para la compra de llantas para su carro.

El socio agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the "UNIDOS PARA EL TRIUNFO" (United for Success) communal bank, which is based in the Cusco district, in the province and state of Cusco.

Marco is 34 years old and single. He works in the taxi business and works every morning and afternoon, and sometimes at night. He works from 5am til 8pm around the streets of Cusco, and this allows him to make ends meet.

The member is requesting a loan to buy tyres for his car.

He is grateful to those who contribute to his dream by providing this, and is committed to making repayments within the agreed period.

loans.use: The member is requesting a loan to buy tyres for his car.

loans.name: Celia  Ysabel

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “UNIDOS PARA EL TRIUNFO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco  y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Celia; ella tiene 35 años de edad, conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de papa, la socia vende en el mercado de vinocancho siendo su horario desde las 06:00am hasta las 05:00pm, de esta manera la socia saca a su familia adelante.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de mercadería para su negocio. 

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Celia belongs to the “Unidos para el Triunfo” community bank which is located in Cusco district, in the province and department of the same name.

Celia is 35 years old.  She lives with her partner and has one child.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her potato business.  She sells her products in Vinocancho Market from 6.00am to 5.00pm.  This is how she gets her family ahead in life.

Celia is requesting this loan to buy merchandise for her business.

She is grateful to those who will take part in this dream by funding her loan and pledges to make her repayments in a timely manner.

loans.use: To buy merchandise for her business

loans.name: Nora

texts.es: Nora, D. 48 años, está casada con Anayo, D. 52 años. En unión familiar ellos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad D. San Pedro D. Cajas. La elaboración D. tapices, chompas, gorras y mantas, son su especialidad, pues ya tiene 28 años dedicados a ello. La creatividad e innovación D. sus diseños, hace que sus ventas sean muy buenas, tanto así que hace algún tiempo abrió una tienda en la casa del artesano, que queda en la ciudad D. Huancayo. Nora, conocedora D. la demanda D. sus tejidos; también los comercializa en la capital del país, a donD. viaja 2 veces al mes. Asimismo ella tiene una tienda D. comestibles, y un carro que hace transporte público, trabajando en la línea Tarma –San Pedro D. Cajas. Con la variedad D. negocios que tiene se siente feliz por el desarrollo y progreso que tiene, por ello más adelante quiere expandir y mejorar sus negocios. Esté es el segundo crédito con MFP, y espera lograr sus objetivos con el trabajo mancomunado con su banco comunal. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará artesanía para surtir su tienda, D. la misma manera comprará lana para tejer las prendas D. vestir que realiza.
texts.en:
Nora is 48 years old.  She is married to 52 year-old Anayo.  They live in their own home in the town of San Pedro D. Cajas.  Nora's speciality is making tapestries, sweaters, caps and blankets.  She has been doing this for 28 years.  The creativity and innovation of her designs means that her sales are very good.  Her sales are so good, in fact, that some time ago she opened a store in 'La Casa del Artesano' ('The Craftman's House') in the city of Huancayo.

Nora is aware of the demand for her items; she also sells them in the country's capital where she travels twice a month.  In addition, she has a grocery store and a car which is used to proviD. public transport on the Tarma – San Pedro D. Cajas route.  Nora feels very happy with the development and progress which she has had with her different businesses.  In the future, she would like to expand and improve her businesses. 

This is Nora's second loan from MFP and she hopes to achieve her goals through her work together with her community bank.  She will use her loan to buy handicrafts to stock her store and she will also buy wool to knit her garments.

loans.use: To buy handicrafts to stock her store and to buy wool for knitting

loans.name: Augusta

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal  “SR. DE TAYANCANI”;  El banco comunal está ubicado en el distrito de Ocongate perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Agusta; La socia es casada y tiene  4 hijos ella se dedica a la compra y venta de granos; también realiza trabajos en lana de oveja y alpaca, la socia hila la lana como se observa en esta fotografía ella está en la reunión del banco comunal y mientras tanto está hilando la lana (es un proceso de pasar la lana enrredada para formar un ovillo); la socia hace mantones, frazadas, ponchos ella previamente tiñe la lana para realizar los tejidos. La socia desea el crédito para comprar lanas de alpaca y ovino para realizar sus trabajos y venderlos. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar lanas y de este modo elaborar sus telares para la venta.

La socia agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete en cumplir con el pago de su cuota en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Agusta is a member of the “Sr. de Tayancani” community bank which is located in Ocongate district, in Quispicanchis province, in Cusco department.

Agusta is married and has 4 children.  She buys and sells grains.  She also makes items from sheep's wool and alpaca wool.  She spins the wool as you can see in this photograph.  She is in a community bank meeting and spinning her wool at the same time (it is a process of passing through the tangled wool to form a ball).  Agusta makes shawls, blankets and ponchos, having dyed her wool before she does her knitting.  Agusta is requesting a loan to buy alpaca and sheep's wool so that she can make her items and sell them.

She is grateful for the loan and appreciates it.  She pledges to make her repayments in a timely manner.

loans.use: To buy wool so that she can knit her items and then sell them

loans.name: Aurelio

texts.es: Aurelio, de 55 años, está casado con Mery, de 53 años. Ambos tienen 11 hijos, pero solo viven con 7 de ellos, en su casa propia ubicada en la localidad de Centro Culebrayoc. La siembra de papa, maíz, habas y arvejas, es su principal actividad desde hace 18 años. Desde las primera horas del día, se dedica al cuidado de sus terrenos agrícolas, que con tanto esfuerzo y dedicación logró obtener. Lo que más le gusta de su labor, es poder quitar la melaza que crece en sus plantaciones, las cuales le resulta un dolor de cabeza, ya que si las permite crecer, pueden malograr el sembrío. Pero sin duda, los días que disfruta Aurelio, son las fechas que lleva su cosecha al mercado mayorista de su ciudad, donde vende su producción y ve reflejado todo su refuerzo. Esté trabajador hombre también, se dedica a la crianza de vaca y carnero, donde vende la leche y la lana que produce. Este es su décimo crédito con MFP, y está seguro que con el esfuerzo conjunto de los integrantes de su banco comunal, podrán salir adelante, en el desarrollo de sus objetivos. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará varios sacos de abono orgánico, como también fertilizantes naturales, los cuales esparcirá en sus sembríos de papa y habas.
texts.en:
Aurelio is 55 years old.  He is married to 53 year-old Mery.  They have 11 children but only live with 7 of them.  They live in their own home in the town of Centro Culebrayoc.

Aurelio grows potatoes, corn, beans and peas.  This has been his main business activity for 18 years.  From the very first hours of each morning, he works on his land which he managed to obtain through hard work and commitment.  What he most likes about his work is being able to get rid of the weeds that grow on his plantations.  They are a real headache because if they are allowed to grow they can ruin his sown fields.  However, without doubt, the days that Aurelio enjoys are the dates when he takes his harvest to the wholesale market in his town, where he sells his produce and sees all his hard work pay off.  This hard-working man also raises cows and rams, selling the milk and wool which they produce. 

This is Aurelio's tenth loan from MFP and he is certain that through the joint work of the members of his community bank, they will be able to get ahead in the development of their goals.  He will use his loan to buy several sacks of organic fertilizer and also natural fertilizers which he will spread over his potato and bean crops.

loans.use: To buy organic fertilizer and other fertilizers

loans.name: Corazones Unidos (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Corazones Unidos está formado por 9 socias que viven en diferentes lugares de la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad se caracteriza por mantener su cultura y tradiciones, en la cual encierra un hermoso centro histórico, su gente es amable y cordial como nuestras socias quienes son mujeres luchadoras quienes con su trabajo diario sacan  adelante a sus familias y les brindan lo mejor que se encuentra a su alcance.

La Señora. Marína G. vive en el centro de la ciudad de Cuenca, es el séptimo crédito que realiza en la banca comunal y le gusta ya que cuenta con grandes amigas quienes cada quince días salen de la rutina con la alegría que cada una pone en la reunión.

Nuestra socia tiene 49 años, es casada y tiene 6 hijos  de 27, 24, 21, 20, 18 y 14 años de edad, sus dos primeros hijos son casados y viven independientes, su tercer hijo se dedica a trabajar y es solo para sus gastos, su cuarta hija estudia en el universidad y sus dos últimos hijos estudiando en un colegio de la ciudad. Su esposo labora como empleado privado, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven arrendando.

Doña Marína tiene un carrito salchipapero en donde vende papas fritas, actividad que viene desempeñando hace un año, vende solo los fines de semana y de lunes a viernes labora en un restaurante desde las 6 de la tarde hasta las 10 de la noche.

Con el dinero de su crédito va a comprar un quintal de papas y golosinas para la venta en su carrito. Su meta es ampliar mucho más su negocio.

La Señora. Jhoana L. vive en las afueras de la ciudad, es una mujer muy joven con apenas 24 años, es separada de su pareja hace un año y tiene 4 hijos de 11, 9, 2 años y su ultimo hijo de apenas 3 meses de edad, sus dos primeros hijos estudian en la escuela, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive en casa de un familiar. 

Doña Jhoana se dedica a laborar en la limpieza de casas, actividad que la desempeña hace 3 años y solo 4 horas al día, trabaja de lunes a sábados.

Este es su primer crédito que realiza en la banca comunal y lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos para iniciar en este negocio. su meta es crecer en este negocio para no tener que salir de su casa y dejar a sus hijos solos.
texts.en:
The Corazones Unidas community bank has 9 members who live in different parts of the city of Cuenca.  This city is noted for having maintained its culture and traditions and its beautiful historic center.  It is also noted for its kind and friendly people such as these women.  These are determined women who, through their daily work, get their families ahead in life and provide them with the best that they can.

Mrs Marína G. lives in the Cuenca city center.  This is her seventh loan with her community bank and she likes it since she has some good friends there who leave their daily routine every two weeks and come to the bank meetings which each one injects with a bit of happiness.

Marína is 49 years old.  She is married and has 6 children aged 27, 24, 21, 20, 18 and 14.  Her eldest two children are married and live independently.  Her third child works and covers his own expenses.  Her fourth child, a girl, studies at university and her youngest two children are studying in high school.  Her husband works as a private employee.  They don't have their own home but rent.

Marína has a 'salchipapero' (Peruvian fast food) cart from which she sells French fries.  She has been in this business for a year.  She sells on weekends.  From Monday to Friday she works in a restaurant from 6.00pm to 10.00pm.

Marína will use her loan to buy a 100kg sack of potatoes and candies to sell on her cart.  Her goal is to expand her business a lot more.

Mrs Jhoana L. lives on the outskirts of the city.  She is a young woman of 24.  She separated from her partner a year ago and has 4 children aged 11, 9, 2 and 3 months.  Her eldest two children are in school.  She doesn't have her own home but lives with a family member.

Jhoana works cleaning houses.  She has been in this business for 3 years and works 4 hours a day, from Monday to Saturday.

This is Jhoana's first loan with her community bank and she will invest it in buying chickens to set herself up in this business.  Her goal is to grow in this business so that she doesn't have to go out and leave her children home alone.

loans.use: To buy a 100kg sack of potatoes; to buy candies and chickens

loans.name: Magno

texts.es: Magno, de 46 años, convive con Rafaela, de 46 años. Ambos tienen 6 hijos, pero solo vive con 3 de ellos, en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Centro Culebrayoc. La siembra de papa, habas, alverja, y verduras, es su principal actividad, ya tiene 20 años dedicándose a la agricultura. Los días miércoles, viernes y domingos, que son los días donde vende en mayores cantidades en el mercado mayorista de la ciudad de Tarma. Lo que más le gusta a Magno, es poder cuidar de sus cultivos, por ello pasa la mayor parte del día en sus terrenos agrícolas. Ahora quiere mejorar sus cultivos, para comenzar a comercializarlos en la capital, y está seguro que con la calidad de sus cosechas logrará grandes éxitos y buenas ganancias. Este es su décimo crédito con MFP y está contento con todo el apoyo que recibió de su banco comunal, que son personas solidA. y muy comprometidas. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará abono orgánico y fertilizantes naturales, para esparcirlos en su producción de papa, que ya muy pronto cosechará en estos meses.
texts.en:
Magno who is 46 lives with Rafaela, also 46. Together they have 6 children but only 3 live with them in their home in Centro Culebrayoc. For the past 20 years he has made a living farming potatoes, beans, peas and vegetables. Wednesdays, Fridays and Sundays are the days he sells the most in the Tarma city wholesale market. 

What Magno enjoys most about his work is caring for his crops and that is why he spends most of his day in the field. Now he wants to improve his crops in order to sell them in the capital. He is sure that with the quality of his crops he will be successful and profitable. 

This is his tenth loan with MFP and he his pleased with all the support that he has received from his community bank. The members are supportive and committed. With the loan he is requesting he will buy organic and natural fertilizers, for his potato crop that he will be harvesting in the coming months.

loans.use: Purchase organic fertilizer

loans.name: Manuel

texts.es: Manuel, de 28 años, es un hombre soltero, que vive con su papá Juan, de 60 años y sus 2 hermanos: Franz, de 15 y Alex, de 14 años. En unión familiar ellos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Centro Culebrayoc. El trabajo al que se dedica es la agricultura, sus principales cultivo constan de papa, arveja, habas y demás hortalizas. Cuenta que desde que tenía 15 años, se dedicó a administrar sus cultivos, los cuales con el tiempo, esfuerzo y mucho trabajo; lograron ser los mejores del mercado mayorista de la ciudad de Tarma, lugar donde vende su producción. La satisfacción que tiene Manuel según afirma, “es poder ayudar a su padre en la crianza y educación de sus hermanos”. Por ello para más adelante desea abrir una tienda de comestibles, donde pueda adquirir mejores ganancias. Este es su décimo crédito con MFP, y asegura que en todo este tiempo de trabajo conjunto y esforzado con su banco comunal, logró obtener muchos éxitos y bendiciones. Por lo que agradece el apoyo brindado. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará varios sacos de abono orgánico, para su cosecha de papa, asimismo invertirá en la contrata de peones, para que le ayuden a sembrar los 100 sacos de cosecha de papa de otra variedad; que sembró en uno de sus terrenos agrícolas.
texts.en:
Manuel is 28 years old.  He is single and lives with his dad Juan, who is 60, and his 2 brothers, 15 year-old Franz and 14 year-old Alex.  They live together in their own home which is located in Centro Culebrayoc.  Manuel works as a farmer.  His main crops are potatoes, peas, beans and other vegetables.  He says that since he was 15 years old he has been looking after his crops and with time and a lot of effort and hard work these have become the best in the wholesale market of the city of Tarma, which is where he sells his produce.   The satisfaction which Miguel has is “to be able to help my father in raising and educating my brothers”.  In the future, he would like to open a grocery store from which he can make better profits.

This is Manuel's tenth loan with MFP and he assures us that, in all this time of working hard together with his community bank, he has managed to obtain a lot of success and blessings.  He is therefore grateful for the support he has been given.  Manuel will use his loan to buy several sacks of organic fertilizer for his potato harvest and he will also invest in hiring laborers who will help him with his 100 sacks of a different variety of potato which he will plant on his land.

loans.use: To buy sacks of fertilizer and hire laborers to help him plant his potatoes

loans.name: Moises

texts.es: Moisés, de 28 años, convive con Mary, de 22 años. Ambos tienen 2 hijos: Ronaldo, de 7 y Anderson, de un año. En unión familiar ellos viven en una casa alquilada, ubicada en la ciudad de Tarma. La siembra de papa y arveja, es su principal actividad, ya tiene 18 años dedicándose a ello y asegura que se siente muy feliz, de poder desarrollar la actividad que le enseñaron sus padres. Sus producciones, después de cada cosecha los comercializa en el mercado mayorista de su localidad, donde también trabaja con su triciclo, cargando y descargando, sacos de papa y fanegas de verduras. Los días de mayor acogida, son los miércoles, viernes y domingos, donde toda la población visita el mercado para hacer las compras de la semana. Es por ello que más adelante desea, juntar un capital considerable de dinero, para poder comprar una moto y con eso comenzar a trabajar en el trasporte público, cubriendo rutas en los alrededores de la ciudad. Este es el quinto crédito con MFP, y como buen integrante de su banco comunal, está seguro que podrá salir adelante, gracias al apoyo y colaboración que recibe. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará varios sacos de abono orgánico, fertilizantes naturales, y 2 bolsas de semilla de arveja, que oscilan entre los 600 a 700 nuevos soles cada una.
texts.en:
Moisés is 28 years old.  He lives together with Mary who is 22.  They have 2 children: 7 year-old Ronaldo and 1 year-old Anderson.  They live in a rented house in the city of Tarma.  Moisés' main business activity is growing potatoes and peas.  He has been doing this for 18 years and he tells us that feels very happy to be able to engage in this activity which his parents taught him.

After each harvest, Moisés sells his produce in the wholesale market in his town.  He also works in the town with his 'triciclo' (three-wheeled vehicle), loading and unloading sacks of potatoes and large quantities of vegetables.  His best days are Wednesdays, Fridays and Sundays because then everybody visits the market to do their weekly shopping.  In the future, he would like to father together a considerable sum of money to be able to buy a motorbike and use it to provide a public transport service, covering routes in the areas around the city.

This is Moisés' fifth loan from MFP and, as a good member of his community bank, he is certain that he will be able to get ahead, thanks to the support and collaboration that he receives.  He will use his loan to buy several sacks of organic fertilizer, natural fertilizers and 2 bags of pea seeds which cost between 600 and 700 Peruvian soles each.

loans.use: To buy several sacks of fertilizer and 2 bags of pea seeds

loans.name: Natividad

texts.es:
Natividad tiene 38 años de edad, es soltera y reside junto a su familia en  el caserío José Olaya, una zona rural del distrito de Tambogrande, lugar dedicado principalmente a las actividades relacionadas con la agricultura y que se encuentra situada en la región Piura, se encuentra ubicada a más de cuatro horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

Se dedica a trabajar en labores asociadas a la agricultura, especialmente a la crianza y venta de animales. Ella cuenta con un grupo de cerdos y gallinas los cuales cría en algunos ambientes ubicados cerca a su domicilio. Cuando estos ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo los ofrece en venta al público en general dentro del mercado de su localidad.

Natividad desea ampliar su negocio con la compra de alimento balanceado de modo que sus animales se desarrollen de mejor modo y puedan ser vendidos a mejor precio durante la presente temporada navideña. Para lograr su objetivo se ha visto en la necesidad de solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 900 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Natividad is 38 years old.  She is single and lives with her family in José Olaya, a rural area in Tambogrande district..  This is an area whose residents work mainly in agriculture and it is located in Piura region, more than four hours from the city of Chiclayo, capital of Lambayeque region.

Natividad works in farming, especially raising and selling animals.  She has a group of pigs and chickens which she raises in pens near her home.  When they have reached a good level of development she offers them for sale to the general public in the town market.

Natividad would like to expand her business by purchasing balanced animal feed so that her animals develop as well as possible and can be sold at a better price during the present Christmas season.  To achieve her goal, she needs to request a loan for 900 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: To buy balanced animal feed to expand her business raising and selling animals

loans.name: Juan Pedro

texts.es:
Juan Pedro tiene 46 años de edad, es casado y reside junto a su familia en el anexo Los Mestas del caserío Sialupe Huamantanga, una zona rural que se encuentra situada en el distrito de Lambayeque y que se encuentra situado a más de media hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo caracterizada por que sus pobladores son personas humildes y trabajadoras.

El cuenta con animales menores, como ovejas, los cuales cría en su domicilio, alimentándolos de granos y pastos naturales. Cuando sus animales se desarrollan completamente los ofrece en venta en su domicilio al publico en general y a los diferentes negociantes que siempre visitan la zona en donde reside. Esta es la principal fuente de ingreso con la que sustenta la economía de su familia.

Juan desea adquirir más animales y alimento balanceado para ampliar su negocio por temporada navideña. Por ello ha decidido solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1200 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.
texts.en:
Juan Pedro is 46 years old.  He is married and lives with his family in Los Mestas annex of the village of Sialupe Huamantanga.  This is a rural area of Lambayeque district which is more than half an hour from the city of Chiclayo and is noted for the fact that most of its residents are modest and hard-working people.

Juan owns young animals such as sheep which he raises at home, feeding them grain and natural fodder  When his animals have developed completely he offers them for sale from his home to the general public and the traders who always visit his district.  This is his main source of income through which he supports his family financially.

Juan would like to acquire more animals and balanced feed to expand his business over the Christmas period.  For this reason, he decided to request a loan for 1,200 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa as this will help him to achieve his goal.

loans.use: To buy animals and balanced feed to expand his business raising and selling animals

loans.name: Flor De María

texts.es:
Flor de María tiene 48 años de edad, es casada y reside junto a su familia en el caserío Pocitos del distrito de Mórrope, una localidad ubicada a más de una hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo caracterizada por que sus pobladores son personas humildes y trabajadoras.

Ella cuenta con animales menores los cuales cría en su domicilio, alimentándolos de granos y pastos naturales. Cuando sus animales se desarrollan completamente los ofrece en venta en su domicilio al publico en general y a los diferentes negociantes que siempre visitan la zona en donde reside. Con los ingresos que percibe de esta actividad ella se encarga de ayudar a su esposo con el sostenimiento de la economía de su familia.

Flor desea adquirir material de construcción para hacer algunas mejoras en su domicilio. Por ello ha decidido solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.
texts.en:
Flor de María is 48 years old.  She is married and lives together with her family in the village of Pocitos, in Mórrope district, more than one hour from the city of Chiclayo.  This area is noted for the fact that its residents are modest and hard-working people.

Flor owns young animals which she raises at home, feeding them grains and natural fodder.  When her animals have developed fully she offers them for sale from her home to the general public and the different traders who always visit her district.  She uses the income she makes from this business to help her husband to financially support their family.

Flor would like to acquire building materials so that she can make some improvements to her home.  For this reason, she has decided to request a loan for 1,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa as this will help her to achieve her goal.

loans.use: To buy building material so that she can make some structural improvements to her home

loans.name: Sim

texts.en: Mrs. Sim N. is a 37-year-old married woman and local villager living in a medium-sized home with family members in Kompong Cham Province. She owns a piece of farmland that she inherited years ago from her grandparents. She uses this land to grow different kinds of crops. She planted rice and vegetable crops and she always gets good results from her plants. Mrs. Sim N.'s family is currently facing difficulty with their living conditions because their house needs repair. To solve the problem, Mrs. Sim N. would like a loan to fix a broken part of her house.

loans.use: To repair a broken part of her house

loans.name: Hairolla

texts.en: Hairolla H. is 45 years old, married, and has three children, two of whom attend school.  He lives in Bayan-Ulgii province in western Mongolia. He and his family live together in a ger, a traditional Mongolian nomadic home tent.  Hairolla operates a livestock and raw material trading business in his town. He started his business in 2004 by purchasing and selling livestock and the animal skins in his local area. His daily sales income is between 15,000 and 25,000 MNT and his net profit is between 15-25%.  He continues to make progress with his business and uses his earnings to improve his family's quality of life. His earnings have enabled him to build a house for his family. After many years of operation, Hairolla has gained many permanent partners and suppliers and was able to create a savings account with 10,000,000 MNT in the bank. Hairolla is requesting a 400,000 MNT loan to purchase more livestock to sell for upcoming preparation of meats for winter.

loans.use: To purchase more livestock to sell

loans.name: Las Novatas (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Las Novatas está formado por 9 mujeres quienes viven en la vecina ciudad D. Azogues, esta ciudad se caracteriza por la belleza D. la estructura D. su ciudad estando su iglesia catedral en la mas alto D. la ciudad, su gente es amable y cordial como nuestras socias quines son mujeres alegres, trabajadoras y luchan para salir  adelante junto a sus familias.

La Señora Mariana Tenesaca vive en la ciudad D. Azogues, es el primer crédito que realiza en la banca comunal.
 
La Señora. Mariana tiene 56 años, todos sus hijos son mayores  D. edad y  casados, solo vive con una hija y comparten los gastos del hogar.

Doña Mariana se dedica a la venta D. papas fritas, tortillas, humitas etc., en su negocio  empezó  vendiendo papas fritas, luego se ha dedicado a la venta D. carnes en palito y así ha ido creciendo poco a poco, primero vendía en su casa y ahora a arrendado un local en la ciudad,   trabaja con su nieto D. quince años.

El dinero D. su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra D. un termo, en ollas y tazas para implementar su local. Su meta es tener un local mucho más granD..
texts.en:
The nine women members of the Novata Community Bank live in the town of Azogues, known for the beauty of its buildings such its tall cathedral. Its people are friendly and warm, just like these cheerful and hardworking women who are working hard to give their families a better future.

Señora Mariana T. lives in Azogues, and this is the first loan she has had with the community bank.She is 56 years old. All her children are grown up and married. She lives with a daughter and they share the cost of running the household. Mariana earns her living selling fries, tortillas, humitas (a kind of corn cake) etc. She started out selling fries only, and then she sold meat on skewers. Gradually the business has expanded. At first she ran the business from her house, but now she rents a stall in the town. Her 15-year old grandson works with her.

Mariana plans to use the loan to buy a Thermos flask, pots, and cups to use at her stall. Her goal is to expand her business even more.

loans.use: to buy a Thermos flask, pots, and cups

loans.name: Huantai

texts.en: Huantai J. is 41 years old and lives with his wife and two teenage daughters in the Bayan-Ulgii province of Mongolia. He and his family live together in a ger, a traditional Mongolian nomadic tent. Both his daughters, ages 16 and 14, attend a local high school. Huantai operates a transportation business between provinces and, during winter months, he operates a coal-delivery business using his own truck. He began his transportation business in 2000 and has gained much experience as a driver. He purchases coal at a per ton rate of 19,600 Mongolian tugriks (MNT) from mines and spends between 250,000 and 300,000 MNT in petrol costs. He makes three to four trips in one month and can deliver up to 13 tons of coal using his big Russian truck and trailer in one trip. His monthly average profit is between 300,000 and 400,000 MNT. Huantai is a hardworking and honest man and says, "I am very glad that I can provide (for) my family by operating this business." He is requesting a 350,000 MNT loan to purchase spare parts for his truck.

loans.use: To purchase spare parts for his truck

loans.name: Lun

texts.en:
Mr. Lun K. (in the photo) and his wife, Mrs. Ratana Meas, have been married since 1998 and have three children: one son and two daughters. Two of them are in school and another one is still too young. The family lives along National Road 6 about 25 kilometers from Phnom Penh.

Mr. Lun K. is a motorcycle repairman. He operates the business at home. He asked for a Kiva loan one time already; he now is asking for another loan of $1,000 to purchase spare additional motorbike spare parts for his business.

loans.use: To purchase additional motorcycle spare parts for his motorbike-repair business

loans.name: Van

texts.en:
Van C., 43, is a single woman living in Kompong Cham Province. She is a local crop farmer, growing rice and vegetables on her farmland. In addition, she also raises some pigs behind her house for additional income to help meet the family's daily expense needs. She has five children; three of them are single and the other two are married. Two of them are employed in different jobs and one has a formal salary per month to share responsibilities with the family. 

Because the pig-raising business is a very profitable one for Van C. and her family, she has requested a loan in order to buy additional feed and piglets to raise for sale during the period when pork is commanding the highest price.

loans.use: To buy additional feed and piglets to raise for sale during the period when pork is commanding the highest price

loans.name: Sok

texts.en:
Mrs. Sok S. (picture here), 25, and her husband, Mr. Bunthoeun Em, 22, live in a small village along National Road Number three about 20  kilometers from Phnom Penh City. They have been married since 2007 and have two young children. She also has her mother living with her.    
 
Sok operates a business renting space in her house to garment factory workers because her house is located near the garment factory. Her husband is a construction worker. She is asking for her first loan of $300 to purchase rice for food.

loans.use: To purchase rice for food.

loans.name: Rith

texts.en: Mr. Rith N., 27 and his wife Mrs. Chanry Thou, 30, live in a small village outside of Phnom Penh. They have been married for four years and have two children — one son and one daughter both still young. Rith is a construction worker and his wife works in a garment factory.
