Pero como buena pobladora de San Pedro, también se dedica a la venta de telares, que con mucho esfuerzo y creatividad teje, los cuales comercializa en el país de Ecuador, donde viaja 2 veces al mes. Por ello más adelante está planeando surtir su negocio de tapices, con nuevos y variados dibujos, asimismo quiere innovar en el material de lanas que trae. Este es noveno crédito con MFP, y como integrante antiguo de su banco comunal, está segura que muy pronto podrá salir adelante. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará 3 fardos de lana de 35 kilos.
texts.en: María is 37 years old and lives with Jesús, who is 40.  They have two children: Humberto, 18, and Jasmira, 16.  They live together in their own house in San Pedro de Cajas. Five years ago, María opened a store selling different-colored wool, which she sells to the people of the area, who knit clothing and rugs. Her business has been doing very well, and she brings in at least 300 soles a week. As a good citizen of San Pedro, she also sells loom-work, which she makes with much effort and creativity, and which she sells in Ecuador, where she travels twice a month.  To get ahead, she is planning to increase her tapestry business, with new and varied designs, and she also wants to innovate in the type of wool she carries.  This is her ninth loan with micro-finance partner MFP, and as a longstanding member of her community bank, she is sure she can pay it back quickly.  With this funding, she will buy three, 35-kilo bundles of wool.

loans.use: To buy three, 35-kilo bundles of wool.

loans.name: Ls Divinas Group

texts.es:
LAS DIVINAS

Salustiana tiene 39 años de edad es Presidenta de La alcancía comunal “LAS DIVINAS” que recién comienza a formar parte de Edaprospo-Prosperidad la cual esta compuesta por 7 integrantes, quienes acordaron colocar este nombre al grupo por que son mujeres y quieren destacar esa cualidad.
La señora Salustiana tiene 4 hijos 2 son independientes y 2 son dependientes la señora junto a su pareja comparten gastos del hogar, Salustiana para poder ayudar a sustentar los gastos del hogar trabaja vendiendo golosinas frente a un colegio inicial y por las mañana prepara y vende tamales. Salustiana quisiera tener un capital de trabajo para poder instalar una bodega en su casa y de esa manera seguir adelante con un negocio nuevo.
texts.en:
LAS DIVINAS

Salustiana is 39 and is the president of the "Las DIvinas” community group, which recently became part of Edaprospo-Prosperidad.  "Las divinas" has  seven members. They chose this name because they are women and want to emphasize that fact.   Salustiana has four children, two of whom are dependent on her and her husband.  To pay the household expenses, she sells food in front of a local school, and in the mornings she makes and sells tamales.  Salustiana is seeking capital so that she can install a bodega in her house, and with this new business, get ahead in the world.

loans.use: To build a bodega in her house.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es: Rosa, de 59 años, convive con José, de 60 años de edad. Ambos tienen 9 hijos, pero solo viven con 2 de ellos: Luis, de 18 y Milton, de 20 años. En unión familiar ellos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en la comunidad nativa de Ñagazu (selva central peruana). Está trabajadora mujer, se dedica a la siembra de café, plátanos, y demás productos de pan llevar, ya tiene 3 años dedicándose a la agricultura. Todos los días desde al amanecer hasta el anochecer, se dedica al cuidado de sus terrenos agrícolas, los que después de cada cosecha se comercializa en la ciudad de Villarica y el café los vende en la asociación de su localidad. Rosa es una mujer muy dedicada, y como pocas personas de su edad, ella quiere salir adelante, por ello quiere aprender a leer y firmar, las ganas de salir adelante es lo que más ambiciona. Ahora ella quiere sembrar más cantidad de café, para poder comercializarlo en los diferentes lugares del país. Esté es el quinto crédito con MFP, y como tesorera de su banco comunal está orgullosa de su banco comunal, y se compromete con el apoyo incondicional y el trabajo arduo. Con el crédito que solicita, invertirá en la contrata de peones para cosechar su producción de caigua y rocoto, asimismo comprará abono orgánico para esparcir en sus 2 hectáreas de sembríos.
texts.en:
Rosa is 59 years old.  She lives with her partner, 60 year-old José.  They have 9 children but only live with 2 of them: 18 year-old Luis and 20 year-old Milton.  They live together in their own home which is located in the indigenous community of Ñagazu (central Peruvian jungle).  This hard-working woman grows coffee, bananas and cereals.  She has been farming for 3 years.  Every day from dawn to dusk she looks after her land.  After every harvest she sells her produce in the city of Villarica.  She sells her coffee in the association in her town.

Rosa is a very committed woman and, like few people of her age, she wants to get ahead.  For this reason, she would like to learn to read and sign.  Her desire to get ahead is what she has as her biggest ambition.  Rosa would like to grow a larger quantity of coffee so that she can sell it in different parts of the country.

This is Rosa's fifth loan from MFP and, as treasurer of her community bank, she is proud of her community bank and pledges unconditional support and hard work.  She will use her loan to invest in hiring laborers to harvest her 'caigua' (a native bean) and rocoto pepper crops.  She will also buy organic manure to spread on her 2 hectares of crops.

loans.use: To hire laborers to harvest her crops.  To buy organic manure

loans.name: Esther

texts.es: Esther, de 28 años, convive con Rafael, de 33 años. Ambos tienen 2 hijos: Maryory, de 8 y Naomi, de 9 años. En unión familiar ellos viven en una casa alquilada en la localidad de San Pedro de Cajas. Está hermosa y creativa mujer, se dedica al arte publicitario, donde pinta letreros, a las diferentes instituciones y entidades del estado Peruano, de la misma manera pinta cuadros artísticos a base de pintura óleo, los cuales vende a un intermediario que lleva los hermosos cuadros al país de Educador, donde son apreciados y bien pagados. Pero como buena pobladora de San Pedro, ella también teje tapices, con diferentes diseños, los que comercializa a los visitantes  que visitan la zona, pero como mujer emprendedora, ella también tienen una tienda de comestibles, donde vende productos de primera necesidad. Por todos los logros adquiridos, más adelante desea abrir un negocio de publicidad gráfica, donde pueda explayar todo el arte que posee. Esté es el segundo crédito con MFP, y como presidenta de su banco comunal, se compromete a direccionar con empeña y empuje el progreso de sus integrantes. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará una afiladora, que le servirá para hacer letreros, asimismo comprará material para pintar sus cuadros.
texts.en: Esther is 28 years old. She lives with Rafael, who is 33. They have 2 children: Maryory,  8 and Naomi, 9. They live together as a family in a rented house in the community of San Pedro de Cajas. This beautiful and creative woman works in advertising art. She paints signs for different institutions and state agencies in Peru.  She also does artistic oil paintings, which she sells through an intermediary who takes her beautiful paintings to  the country of Ecuador, where they are appreciated fetch a good price. But as a good townsperson of San Pedro, she also weaves tapestries with different designs. She sells these to people who visit the area. As an enterprising woman, she also has a store where she sells staple products. With everything that she has accomplished, in the future she wants to open a graphics business where she can display all of the art she has. This is her second loan with MFP, and as president of her communal bank, she is committed to leading with achievement and towards the progress of its members. With the loan she is asking for, she will buy a sharpener which she will use to make signs. She will also buy material to do her paintings.

loans.use: To buy materials to paint pictures as well as a sharpener to make signs .

loans.name: Lorenzo Antonio

texts.es:
Lorenzo, reside en San Simón, departamento de Morazán, tiene 59 años de edad, se dedica a la siembra y comercialización de hortalizas, él vive con su familia que es su esposa y cinco hijos quienes son: María de 29 años, Juan Pablo de 23, Lorena de 22, Pedro Eugenio de 20 y Lucio de 16 años de edad. Don Lorenzo tiene más de 14 años de dedicarse a sembrar las hortalizas, esta siembra la realiza en verano con la ayuda de sus hijos,  él recibió asesoría técnica para realizar los cultivos.
Don Lorenzo quiere sembrar en esta temporada que comienza el verano y para realizarlo solicita un préstamo ya que no cuenta con dinero para comprar los materiales agrícolas como fertilizantes, además necesita poliducto para hace llegar agua hasta la zona del cultivo y poder regar durante el crecimiento.
Con esta ayuda desarrollara la siembra y le dará el cuido necesario para que crezca sanamente y pueda dar frutos, aunque su riesgo son las plagas que pueden llegar y dañar la producción; Su objetivo es cancelar en las fechas establecidas, recibir una buena cosecha, vender a los mejores precios para ayudar a su familia a salir adelante y que sus hijos se preparen profesionalmente.
texts.en:
Lorenzo lives in San Simón, in the department of Morazánin. He is 59 years old and his business is the growing and selling of vegetables. He lives with his family, consisting of his wife and five children: María, 29; Juan Pablo, 23; Lorena, 22; Pedro Eugenio, 20; and Lucio, 16.

Lorenzo has been cultivating vegetables for more than 14 years. Each summer his children help him bring in the harvest. He also receives technical agricultural advice.

Lorenzo is seeking a loan for planting a new crop, as he does not have enough money for agricultural supplies such as fertilizer. He also needs plastic pipe to irrigate his fields. With the help of this loan, he will complete the planting and give the plants the necessary care to grow healthy, although there is always a risk of damage by insects. His goal is to pay off the loan on schedule, have a good harvest, and sell at a good price. This will help his family get ahead and his children get an education.

loans.use: Buy fertilizer and plastic pipe

loans.name: Maria Ines

texts.es:
Doña María, se dedica a elaborar comales y ollas de barro, tiene 45 años de edad, vive con su hijo Ronald de 10 años de edad, residen en Guatajiagua departamento de Morazán, posee más de 12 años de administrar el negocio, su horario es de 8:00pm a 5:00 pm, trabaja sola y este negocio lo heredo de su madre.
En esta ocasión está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de leña, barro y nacazcol, estos materiales los necesita para elaborar los comales y ollas, con esta inversión mantendrá material suficiente para poder realizar muchos artículos para ofrecer a los clientes y será una oportunidad para vender una mayor cantidad.
Su objetivo es contar con solvencia económica para poder terminar de cancelar el lote de tierra y lograr que sea suyo, también cancelar este préstamo y que en su hogar no falte la alimentación.
texts.en:
Ms. Maria makes clay tortilla griddles and pots. She is 45 years old, lives with her 10 year old son Ronaldo, and resides in Guatajiagua in the department of Morazan. She has run her business for more than 12 years and her working hours are from 8:00 pm to 5:00 pm. She works alone and inherited this business from her mother.
On this occasion she is requesting a loan for the purchase of firewood, clay and nacazcol (a type of dye). She needs these materials to make tortilla griddles and pots. With this investment she will maintain sufficient material to be able to produce many articles to offer to her customers, and it will be an opportunity for her to sell a larger quantity.
Her objective is to be able to count on economic solvency in order to finish paying off the plot of land and make it hers, as well as to settle this loan, and so that she doesn't lack food in her home.

loans.use: To buy firewood, clay and nacazcol (a type of dye)

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: Juan tiene 35 años, está casado con Delia, de 34 años. Ambos tienen 5 hijos, todos ellos menores de edad, a los que cría y educa en una casa alquilada, ubicada en la localidad de San Pedro de Cajas. Los principales tejidos de Juan se basa en tapices, mantas, gorras, ponchos. Desde que tenía 13 años, comenzó a descubrir las técnicas del tejido y bordados, los cuales gracias a su persistencia y creatividad, los comercializa a buen precio en la ciudad de Huancayo, donde viaja 2 veces al mes. Los momentos que más le gusta a Juan, son los días que comercializa sus tejidos, pues ve cristalizado los días y las noches de esfuerzo y trabajo. Ahora esté emprendedor joven desea, proyectar sus ingresos en la ampliación de su taller, invirtiendo en la compra de más telares, con los que pueda aumentar la cantidad de sus tejidos. Este es el primer crédito con MFP, y como integrante nuevo de su banco comunal, se siente satisfecho por el apoyo que le brindaron, comprometiéndose a no defraudarlos. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará 21 kilos de lana.
texts.en:
Juan, age 35, is married to 34 year old Delia.  They have five minor children.  They raise and educate their children in a rented house, which is located in San Pedro de Cajas.

Juan mainly weaves tapestries, blankets, caps, and ponchos.  When he was 13 years old he started to discover the techniques of weaving and embroidery.  Thanks to his persistence and creativity, he sells his products for a good price in the city of Huancayo, where he travels twice a month.

The times that Juan likes the most are the days that he sells his weavings.  This is when he sees that his days and nights of effort and work have materialized.  This young entrepreneur now wishes to invest his earnings to expand his shop.  He will buy more looms to be able to increase the number of weavings.  

This is his first loan with MFP.  As a new member of his communal bank he is satisfied with the support that is offered to him, and he promises not to disappoint.  He will use the loan that he is requesting to buy 21 kilos of wool.

loans.use: To buy 21 kilos of wool

loans.name: Jose Bernardo

texts.es:
José, reside en Agua Zarca, Osicala, departamento de Morazán, su negocio es una cafetería y mini tienda, vive con sus padres y dos hermanos, él es soltero y tiene 37 años de edad.
José tiene 3 años de poseer el negocio, lo atiende de 6:00am a 7:00pm, este negocio originalmente era de su hermano pero él se lo compro, y por el momento solicita un préstamo para invertirlo en mercadería como sodas, frijoles, arroz, ayudando de esta manera al negocio ya que será fortalecido con muchas más opciones para ofrecer a los clientes, pero también José se ayuda con esta inversión a crecer en el comercio y de alguna manera a asegurar  mejores ingresos.
El objetivo de él es ampliar el negocio, cancelar puntualmente y ahorrar para comprar donde construir su propia casa.
texts.en:
José lives in Agua Zarca, Osicala, which is in the Morazán department.  His business is a cafeteria and a mini store.  He lives with his parents and two siblings.  He is 37 years old and single.

José has had his business for three years.  He works there from 6:00 a.m. until 7:00 p.m.  The business was originally his brother’s, but José bought it from him.

He is now requesting a loan to buy merchandise like sodas, beans, and rice.  This way he will help his business, which will be strengthened by many more options to offer his customers.  With this investment José will also help himself grow in the business, which will assure better earnings.

His objective is to expand his business, pay punctually, and to save to buy a place to build his own house.

loans.use: To buy merchandise like sodas, beans, and rice

loans.name: Maritza Isabel

texts.es:
Maritza de 28 años de edad, reside en Guatajiagua, departamento de Morazán donde vive con sus hijos ya que es madre soltera, sus hijos son dos: Francisco de 8 años y Analis de 1 año ½, su abuela vive cerca y la ha apoyado en el cuido de sus hijos mientras ella se dedica a la preparación de comales de barro, desde hace 12 años se dedica a este negocio con un horario de 8:00am a 5:00pm, este oficio se lo enseño su abuela y es la fuente de ingreso para mantener a sus hijos.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de barro, leña, semillas de nacazcol y loza cruda, con esta compra tendrá la oportunidad de continuar elaborando comales y venderlos para recibir ingresos para su hogar.
Su principal sueño es que sus hijos no les falte la alimentación y vestuarios además que se preparen estudiando, ella tiene la esperanza de continuar trabajando y gozar de salud para no desmayar y mejorar las condiciones de vida de toda su familia.
texts.en:
Maritza, age 28, lives in Guatajiagua in the Morazán department.  She is a single mother, and she lives with her two children.  Francisco is eight years old, and Analis is one and a half.  Her grandmother lives nearby, and she has helped take care of the children while Maritza makes clay comales (a smooth, flat griddle typically used in Latin America to cook tortillas, toast spices, sear meat, and generally prepare food).

She has had this business for 12 years, and her work schedule is from 8:00 a.m. until 5:00 p.m.  Her grandmother taught her this skill, and it is her source of income to support her children.

She is requesting a loan to buy clay, firewood, nacazcol seeds (a type of dye), and unfired earthenware.  With these purchases she will have the opportunity to continue making comales and selling them in order to get income for her household.

Her primary dream is that her children do not lack food and clothes.  Also, she dreams that they prepare themselves by getting an education.  She hopes to continue working and enjoying good health so that she does not get discouraged and that she improves her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: To buy clay, firewood, nacazcol seeds (a type of dye), and unfired earthenware

loans.name: Jose Antonio

texts.es:
José, tiene 39 años de edad, reside en San Simón, departamento de Morazán, vive con su familia conformada por su esposa y tres hijos, francisco de 18 años, José de 13 y Lucia de 2 años de edad; don José se dedica a la construcción de viviendas desde hace 15 años, con el horario de 6:00am a 3:00pm, el comenzó como ayudante de albañil, pero fue muy aplicado lo que le permitió aprender y volverse un albañil.
Hoy día esta con la idea de mejorar su casa, por lo que solicita un préstamo para comprar los materiales, también quiere comprar un taladro y una pulidora ya que son herramientas necesarias para la construcción y con los que él no cuenta pero que a través del préstamo lograra contar con ellos.
Su objetivo es cancelar puntualmente el préstamo, realizar una buena inversión  y velar por todo lo necesario para su hogar.
texts.en:
José is 39 years old.  He lives in San Simón, in Morazán department with his family; his wife and three children: 18 year-old Francisco, 13 year-old José and 2 year-old Lucia.  José has worked as a builder for 15 years.  He works from 6.00am to 3.00pm.  He started out as an assistant builder but worked very hard which allowed him to learn and become a builder.

Right now he would like to improve his house which is why he is requesting a loan.  He would like to buy building materials and also a drill and a polisher which are the tools he needs for the work but doesn't currently have.  He will acquire them with this loan.

José's goal is to repay his loan on time, make a good investment and look after his family's needs.

loans.use: To buy building materials to improve his house.  To buy tools.

loans.name: Aparicio

texts.es: Aparicio, de 54 años, vive en su casa propia al lado de su esposa Martha de 46 años, que es comerciante, y de sus 5 hijos, los cuales son mayores y trabajan; juntos se esfuerzan cada día por salir adelante. Desde muy joven este trabajador hombre aprendió a elaborar bijouteria (collares, aretes, pulseras) de diversa pedrería; y cuando tuvo que sacar adelante a su familia no dudo en seguir con este trabajo. En la actualidad produce, al por mayor, toda clase de bijouteria y la comercializa por pedidos a los grandes emporios de la ciudad. Esta muy satisfecho pues obtiene regulares ganancias que le han permitido sacar a su familia adelante; además la labor es tranquila pues la realiza en su casa de lunes a viernes, durante la mañana y en la tarde. Trabaja solo, ya que el resto de su familia se dedica a otras labores; y entrega la mercadería una vez a la semana; pero como es un hombre trabajador tiene muchos planes para el futuro como el de aumentar la cantidad de mercadería que comercializa para mejorar sus ganancias. Es el primer crédito que tiene con MFP y promete pagar sus cuotas puntualmente ya que no quiere quedar mal con las personas que hicieron posible este aporte que le permitirá continuar trabajando en busca del progreso. Aparicio tiene planeado invertir el crédito solicitado en la compra de mercadería en pedrería para cumplir con un pedido que tiene pendiente, de esta manera espera continuar progresando.
texts.en:
Aparicio is 54 years old.  He lives in his own home together with his wife, 46 year-old Martha who is a saleswoman, and their five children.  Their children are all grown up and work.  Together they all work hard every day to get ahead in life. From a young age, this hard-working man learned to make jewelry (necklaces, earrings, bracelets) from different precious stones.  When he had to support his family, he didn't hesitate to continue with this work.  He currently produces all kinds of jewelry wholesale and he sells, to order, to the large stores in the city. 

Aparicio is very satisfied because he makes regular profits which have allowed him to get his family ahead.  In addition, the work is relaxed since he does it from Monday to Friday, in the mornings and afternoons.  He works alone, since the rest of his family work in other jobs, and he delivers his goods once a week.  However, as he is a hard-working man, he has many plans for the future such as increasing the quantity of goods that he sells in order to improve his profits.

This is the first loan that Aparicio has had from MFP and he pledges to make his repayments on time as he doesn't want to disappoint the people who made this support possible since it will allow him to continue working in search of progress.  Aparicio is planning to invest the loan in buying merchandise, in buying precious stones so that he can fill an order that he has pending.  In this way he hopes to continue making progress.

loans.use: To buy precious stones so that he can fill orders from his customers

loans.name: Jose Carlos

texts.es:
Don José Carlos, tiene 51 años de edad, reside en Jocoaitique departamento de Morazán, vive con su esposa y sus dos hijos de 17 y 20 años de edad, se dedica a la talabartería, este negocio trata de la elaboración de productos de cuero en este caso el elabora vainas para machetes ya que estos machetes son muy utilizados en la gente del campo; él aprendió desde pequeño porque su padre se dedicaba a este negocio, lo cual lo aprendió muy bien y hoy representa su fuente de ingreso para el sostenimiento del hogar.
Él solicita un préstamo para la compra de Cuero ya que este se le disminuye rápidamente  por lo que su intención es fortalecer el inventario y elaborar las vainas para comercializarlas.
Con esta ayuda espera incrementar su producción, que sus ventas aumenten y seguir creciendo con el negocio para contar con ingresos que solventen las necesidades del hogar.
texts.en:
Mr. José Carlos is 51 years old, lives in Jocoaitique in the department of Morazan with his wife and two children of 17 and 20 years old. He has a leather working business which is dedicated to the production of leather goods, in this case he makes sheaths for machetes as machetes are used a lot by the people from the countryside. He learned very young because his father worked in this business, and he learned it very well. Today it represents his source of income for the support of the household.

He is requesting a loan for the purchase of leather as it diminishes rapidly, and for which his intention is to reinforce his inventory and make sheaths and market them. With this help he hopes to increase his production and his sales, and to continue expanding the business to be able to count on the income to provide for the household necessities.

loans.use: Purchase of leather

loans.name: Orbelina

texts.es:
Doña Orbelina, es una señora D. 57 años D. edad, resiD. en Berlín, departamento D. Usulután tiene casa propia donD. vive con su hijo D. 16 años y su esposo, ella administra una tienda desD. hace más D. 20 años, lo inicio por sus propios medios, no tiene horario para atender el negocio ya que está situado en su casa D. habitación. 
Ella está solicitando un préstamo en esta ocasión para la compra D. aceite, arroz, frijoles, cereales, gaseosas y gas, con este préstamo ella desea realizar una buena inversión al negocio, impulsándolo para que sea más competente para atender la demanda.
Tener un negocio fuerte, crecer como microempresaria son parte D. las aspiraciones D. doña Orbelina, así como también tener ingresos D. una forma estable para mejorar su condición D. vida.
texts.en:
Orbelina is a 57 year old woman who lives in Berlín, departament of D. Usulután. She owns her own home where she lives with her 16 year old son and her husband. She has run a store for more than 20 years. She started it on her own and has no set schedule to attend to the business, since it is at her house.   

She is asking for a loan at this time to buy oil, rice, grains, soft drinks and natural gas. She wants to make a good investment in her business with this loan, driving it to become more able to respond to demand. 

To have a strong business and to grow as a micro-business woman are a part of Orbelina's dreams. She also wants to have stable income to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: To buy oil, rice, beans, grains, soft drinks and natural gas.

loans.name: Banco Mujer Eben-Ezer Group

texts.en:
The Women´s Bank of Eben-Ezer is made up of 7 women members from Grano de Oro, Limón, located in the Caribbean region of Costa Rica. The name of this group, not to be confused with the name of an unpopular humbugger named Scrooge, was chosen by the members for its symbolic biblical meaning: ¨Hasta aqui nos ha ayudado Dios¨ which translates as ¨God helped us get to this point¨.  The loan consultant who has been working with this group describes the women as experienced, enthusiastic, hardworking individuals who seek to improve their family living conditions and offer support to one another. 

The members of this group are involved in various micro-entrepreneurial activities including clothing sales, animal rearing and magazine sales. This loan will serve as working capital, used to make general investments in each woman´s individual business. Specifically, this loan will be put towards the purchase of livestock, animal feed, clothing merchandise (sandals, shoes, jewelry) and magazines. 

Lucrecia C. V. is the elected president of this group. She is a 54-year-old mother of 5 (and grandmother) who lives with her husband, daughter, and grandson in Grano de Oro. Lucrecia has a retail business.  She plans to use this loan to invest in the purchase of merchandise such as clothing, shoes, and perfumes. 

Lucrecia says her day starts in the early morning when she rises to take care of household tasks such as taking care of her grandchild, cooking, and cleaning. The rest of her day is dedicated to her business, making sales, collecting repayments or purchasing merchandise. Her long term goal is to own her own store in a central location where she could offer her clients various items to peruse. This would permit her to spend less time in the street, making sales from door to door.  Her goals are to achieve economic stability for her family and improve their standards of living. 

A major difficulty that has affected her business has been the global economic crisis in the form of a reduction in sales. Lucrecia hopes to overcome this obstacle by expanding her business and securing clients in other communities. 

The members of this group have grown to know each other on a deep and personal level. They have lived in the same community for the majority of their lives and are largely neighbors, family members, and friends. Lucrecia says the advantage of the group lending model is the ability of each member to act as a guarantor for another member. She can´t see any disadvantages associated with this loan.

loans.use: To purchase clothes, shoes, perfumes for resale; to purchase livestock; to purchase magazines for resale

loans.name: Rosa Estela

texts.es:
Rosa Estela, resiD. en Jucuapa departamento D. Usulután, donD. vive con su esposo e hijos D. las edades 6 y 18 años, el negocio es la venta D. ropa, es propio, lo atienD. D. 8:00am á 5:00pm, lo inicio hace 5 años por iniciativa propia, doña Rosa tiene 39 años D. edad.
Ella quiere impulsar su negocio hacia el crecimiento dentro del mercado, por lo que solicita un préstamo para comprar ropa como blusas, pantalones, camisas D. vestir, D. esta manera se está preparando para la mayor demanda que se acerca en temporada naviD.ña, aprovechado para tener mayores ganancias y la preferencia D. muchas personas.
Sueña con ser una empresaria con el negocio fuerte, con mucha clientela, y contribuir a mejorar los ingresos D. la familia.
texts.en:
Rosa Estela lives in Jucuapa in the Usulutan department with her husband and children aged 6 to 18 years.  She has a business selling clothing.  It is her own business, and she attends to her shop from 8am until 5pm.  She started this business 5 years ago on her own initiative.  Rosa is 39 years old.

Rosa wants to propel her business toward growth in the marketplace, and so she requests a loan to buy clothing such as blouses, trousers, and dress shirts.  In this way, she is preparing for the greater demand that occurs as we approach the Christmas season.  She wants to take advantage of this so that she can have greater earnings and attract many customers.

She dreams of being a businesswoman with a strong business that has many customers, so that she can contribute more to the family income.

loans.use: to buy blouses, trousers and dress shirts

loans.name: Mercedes Elizabeth

texts.es:
Mercedes de 39 años de edad, reside en Berlín departamento de Usulután, vive junto a sus tres hijos de 6, 10 y 15 años de edad, se dedica a la venta de sandalias y ropa,  este negocio es propio lo inicio hace 10 años y lo aprendió de su madre, el horario de atención es de 8:00am á 6:00pm, está ubicado en el mercado municipal de Berlín.
Ella está en proceso de invertir en el negocio, comprando sandalias, zapatos, ropa (blusas, faldas, ropa interior), este plan le surge por la necesidad de ofrecer para esta temporada a los clientes lo mejor en mercadería ya que las personas durante este tiempo se compra ropa y zapatos, Mercedes quiere aprovechar y mejorar sus ingresos.
Sueña tener un negocio fortalecido en su inventario, crecer como microempresaria, atender muchos clientes y satisfacer sus gustos y generar ingresos para el progreso de su hogar.
texts.en:
Mercedes is 39 years old. She lives in  Berlín, departament of Usulután. She lives with her three children, aged 6, 10 and 15 years old. She sells sandals and clothing. She started this business 10 years ago and learned it from her mother. Her work schedule is from 8:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. It is located in the municipal market of  Berlín.

She is in the process of investing in the business, buying sandals, shoes, clothing (blouses, skirts, underwear). This plan came up out of necesity of offering her customers the best merchandise of ths season, since people buy clothes and shoes around this time. Mercedes  wants to take advantage of that and improve her income. 

She dreams of having a business fortified by its inventory, to grow as a micro-business woman, to serve a lot of customers and to generate income for the progress of her home.

loans.use: To buy sandals, shoes and clothing (blouses, skirts, underwear).

loans.name: Eva

texts.es: Eva, de 35 años, vive en una casa alquilada al lado de sus 3 hijos menores, que estudian en el colegio y juntos se esfuerzan cada día por salir adelante. Hace más de 1 año, esta emprendedora mujer se dedica a la fabricación de vasos  descartables utilizados en fiestas infantiles. Dice que empezó en este negocio, pues su hermana tiene una piñatería en la ciudad, y en el lugar le brindó un espacio desde donde ella realiza los vasos con decoración de personajes animados. Esta muy satisfecha, pues en poco tiempo ha captado gran cantidad de clientes que le piden los vasos decorados a diario, por lo que su capital de trabajo se encuentra en constante movimiento. Aunque trabaja sola por el momento, cuando sus hijos se desocupan la ayudan en el traslado de mercadería en vasos que también comercializa por la zona donde vive y también tiene pedidos en las provincias del país. Además como es una mujer emprendedora para el futuro tiene planeado instalar su propia piñateria en la ciudad, y en el lugar tiene planeado aumentar sus ventas y ganancias. Es el segundo crédito que tiene con MFP y promete pagar sus cuotas puntualmente ya que no quiere quedar mal con las personas que hicieron posible el dinero que le permitirá continuar trabajando en busca del progreso. Eva tiene planeado invertir el crédito solicitado en la compra de papel crosse (especial para el forrado de los vasos) y de esta manera espera mejorar sus ganancias.
texts.en: Eva, 35 years old, lives in a rented house along with her 3 minor children who go to high school, and who together make an effort each day to get ahead. For more than 1 year, this enterprising woman has produced disposable cups for use at childrens' parties. She says that she started this business because her sister has a party supply shop in the city and provided her with a space where she produces cups decorated with animated characters. She is very satisfied since in a short time she has attracted a large quantity of customers who ask her daily for decorated cups, and is the reason for which her working capital is in constant movement. Although she works alone for the moment, when her children are free they help her with the transport of merchandise which she also markets throughout the zone in which she lives, and she also has orders in the provincial areas of the country. Also, since she is an enterprising woman, she has planned for the future to install her own party supply shop in the city and plans to increase her sales and earnings. This is the second loan she has had with [field partner] MFP and promises to pay her installments punctually as she doesn't want to make a bad impression on the people who make possible the money which will allow her to continue working in search of progress. Eva plans to invest the requested loan in the purchase of "crosse" paper (specially used for cup lining), and in this way she hopes to improve her earnings.

loans.use: To buy "crosse" paper, specially used for lining cups.

loans.name: Exito Con Cristo 1, 2 & 3 Group

texts.en:
Martha is the coordinator of her group Exito Con Cristo 1, 2 & 3. She makes her home here in a simple structure with her two children. She says that her most difficult challenges are to raise her children and to educate them.  In the meantime she plans to continue enjoying to be at her home and to cook.

Martha is excited to be taking her third loan with Esperanza after having successfully repaid her previous loan and grown her business. She has had her business for almost two years, starting with her first Esperanza loan. She plans to use this loan to invest in her business by buying jeans, shirts, shoes, etc. She will use the profits to invest in her business, she will purchase more products to expand her December sales. 

This Esperanza association began with us because she needed to start a business and her  story is representative of her group and of Esperanza's Haitian (many of whom recently emigrated to the DR from Haiti) and Dominican clients generally.  Her group is located in San Pedro D. Macoris, a city famous for baseball players and sugar cane industries.  The main economic activities are: the Free trading zone, a cement factory, and others. This area, like nearly all impoverished areas in the Dominican Republic, suffers from unreliable running water (none of which is potable) and electricity.

For this group of 15 we decided to take two pictures instead of one, where faces are visible. They all belong to the same Bank of Hope.

loans.use: To buy clothes to resell

loans.name: Ana Lilian

texts.es:
Ana, tiene 26 años, reside en Jucuapa departamento de Usulután, vive con su esposo y su hijo de 3 años de edad, se dedica a la venta de tortillas, negocio que posee desde hace 4 años, ella comenzó a vender con su madre, pero luego se independizo y hoy posee su propio negocio, el horario de venta es de 8:00am a 4:00pm, por el momento ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de maíz y leña, este préstamo le ayudara a comprar los materiales necesarios para preparar las tortillas y poder disponer de mayor cantidad el inventario.
Ella espera crecer atendiendo a más clientes, aspira tener el negocio establecido en el mercado municipal ya que ahí podrá tener mejores oportunidades de aumentar las ventas.
texts.en:
Ana is 26 years old.  She lives in Jucuapa, in Usulután department, with her husband and her 3 year-old child.  She sells tortillas, a business which she has had for 4 years.  She started selling with her mother but then became independent and now she has her own business.  She sells her tortillas from 8.00am to 4.00pm.  She is requesting this loan to buy corn and firewood.  This loan will help her to buy the materials she needs to make her tortillas and have a larger inventory.

Ana hopes to grow in her business, serving more customers.  She aspires to have an established business in the town market because she will have better opportunities to increase her sales there.

loans.use: To buy corn and firewood

loans.name: German Antonio

texts.es:
Germán es un padre de familia muy dedicado al trabajo, para lograr dar el apoyo  a sus hijos. Hoy en día trabaja en servicios de seguridad, anteriormente trabajaba de conductor.
Cuenta con el apoyo de su esposa ya que también trabaja de domesticas para poder equilibrarse con los gastos, ya que la canasta básica esta ah altos costos.
Atreves de los prestamos ha logrado la mejora a su vivienda, el cual está contento. 
Comprara materiales de construcción como cerámica, mortero para pegar la cerámica, cruceta. El cual pegara en el cuarto. Logrando mejor higiene y mejor comodidad para su familia.
texts.en:
Germán is the father of a family and very dedicated to his work, in order to provide help for his children. At present, Germán works in security services; before, he worked as a conductor.

He can count on his wife's help.  She works as a domestic to balance out household costs, because the basic family food basket is costly.

By means of these loans, Germán has completed some home improvements, and for which he is pleased.  With this loan, he will purchase construction materials, including tile, crosspieces, and mortar to attach the tile, in order to achieve better hygiene and greater comfort for his family.

loans.use: TO BUY TILES  AND MORTAR FOR HIS ROOM FOR GREATER COMFORT AND HYGIENE

loans.name: Angelica

texts.es: La Sra. Angelica M., es una persona que igual que su esposo trabajan  vendiendo, ropa, tamales, y trabajos de albañileria, pero cuentan con el apoyo de sus hijos, que viven con ellos y les ayudan en lo que pueden, ya que el terreno donde viven es muy grande, y es esta la razon por la que la sra. Angelica, esta ampliando su casa, para cuando le llegan  las visitas, tener donde acomodarlas, ella es una persona muy sencilla que le abre las puertas a todo el mundo, y ofrece su confianza , este es el segundo credito que ella tiene con esta institucion, por lo que esta muy contenta de que le hayan brindado la oportunidad de ser una  cliente mas, y asi poder ampliar su casita, ya que su esposo es quien se encarga de hacer los trabajos pesados de albañileria, y eso es un ahorro para ellos.
texts.en: Señora Angelica M., like her husband, sells clothes, tamales, and performs some bricklaying work.  They also depend on the support of their children, whom live with them and help them when they can.  The plot of land where they live is very big, hence Señora Angelica is expanding her house so that when visitors come, she has space to accommodate them.  She is a simple person that opens her door to the whole world and lends them her trust.  This is the second credit that she has had with this institution.  She is very happy that they have given her the opportunity to be one of their clients and as such be able to expand her little house.  Since her husband will be in charge of carrying out all of the heavy bricklaying work, this will be a huge saving for them.

loans.use: Expand the house so there is more room for grandchildren and church visitors.

loans.name: Emilia De Jesus

texts.es:
Doña Emilia, reside en Jucuapa departamento de Usulután,  tiene 43 años de edad, se dedica  a atender el negocio de pupuseria y comedor, su familia la conforman: su esposo y sus hijos de 12 y 14 años de edad, lleva 9 años de dedicarse al comedor lo atiende de 6:00am a 5:00pm, este negocio lo administra con gran dedicación pues ha contado con él desde hace mucho para ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar. 
Doña Emilia está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de chicharrón, quesillo, pollo, maíz y verduras, con esta inversión pretende fortalecer el inventario del negocio, y de esta manera tener a disposición de los clientes para preparar alimentos y mejorar su servicio.
Sueña con crecimiento económico y comercial, con éxito en la administración del negocio, atender de la mejor manera a los clientes y prosperar cada día junto a su familia.
texts.en: Doña Emilia lives in Jucuapa, a Department of Usulutan.  She is 43 years old and runs a cafeteria and pupusa (an El Salvadorean fried tortilla filled with meat and cheese) business.  Her family is made up of her husband and her children of 12 and 14 years of age.  She has worked at the cafeteria for the past 9 years and operates it from 6am to 5pm.  She manages this business with great dedication because she relies on it to help her husband with the household costs.  Doña Emilia is applying for a loan in order to purchase pork rinds, cheese, chicken, corn, and vegetables.  With this investment, she plans to have a well-stocked inventory for her business that would permit her to prepare more dishes and improve her customer service.  She dreams of economic and commercial growth, which she hope to accomplish through successful administration of her business, providing the best possible attention to her customers, and thriving alongside her family.

loans.use: Purchase pork rinds, cheese, chicken, corn, and vegetables.

loans.name: Ana Betty

texts.es:
Ana tiene 43 años de edad, reside en Santiago de María, departamento de Usulután, vive con su esposo y tres hijos  de 12, 14, 20 años de edad, posee un negocio que es una mini-ferretería donde ofrece diversos artículos necesarios en el hogar como, lámparas, radios, herramientas; el horario de trabajo es de 8:00am a 5:00pm, tiene 2 años de existir.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para comprar artículos para la venta como Lámparas, ruedas para bicicletas, bombillos, carteras y accesorios eléctricos, con esta inversión ella espera tener mejores oportunidades para vender estos artículos, atraer a muchos clientes.
Sueña con tener un negocio fuerte que ya no sea una mini ferretería sino al contrario sea una gran ferretería que ofrezca a las personas de la zona lo mejor en artículos para el hogar y herramientas, con la intención de mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en: Ana is 43 years old and resides in Santiago de Maria, the department of Usulutan.  She lives with her husband and their three children of 12, 14, and 20 years of age.  For the past two years, she has owned a small hardware business where she sells a variety of necessary household items, such as lamps, radios, and tools.  She works there from 8am to 5pm.  She is applying for a loan in order to purchase more items to sell, such as lamps, bicycle wheels/tires, light bulbs, wallets, and electronic accessories.  With this loan she hopes to improve her chances of selling more items and attracting more customers.  She dreams of having a larger business so that it is no longer only a small hardware store, but a big one that offers the customers in her area the best products and tools available for their home, all in the hopes of improving her family's quality of life.

loans.use: Purchase items such as lamps, bicycle tires, and light bulbs.

loans.name: El Rapidito Group

texts.es:
ESTE GRUPO SE LLAMA EL RAPIDITO POR QUE NUNCA SE IMAGINARON QUE SE LES FUERA A BRINDAR EL SERVICIO EN POCO TIEMPO;  ESTÁ UBICADO EN EL ESTADO D. MÉXICO. EL GRUPO ESTÁ CONFORMADO POR DIEZ INTEGRANTES. 

L. SEÑORA ESTHEL. LÓPEZ ES L. TESORERA DEL GRUPO, ESTUDIO HASTA PRIMERO D. SECUNDARÍA; ES AMA D. CASA Y  TIENE DOS HIJAS, UNA D. ELLAS TIENE SEIS AÑOS Y L. OTRA TIENE CUATRO MESES. DESD. HACE CUATRO AÑOS SE DEDICA A L. CRÍA Y VENTA D. POLLOS, NOS COMENTA QUE GRACIAS A QUE HA INVERTIDO EN EL NEGOCIO D. LOS POLLOS ELL. CONTRUYÓ SU CASA, L. CUAL TODAVIA NO TERMINA. ELL. ESPERA CON EL CREDITO PODER INVERTIR MÁS YA QUE EN ESTA TEMPORADA ES CUANDO TIENE MAS VENTAS. ESTHEL. REALIZA SUS VENTAS EN EL TIANGUIS Y VAN PERSONAS D. LAS COMUNIDADES CERCANAS A COMPRARLE TAMBIEN A SU DOMICILIO, ELL. DICE QUE EL EXITO D. SU NEGOCIO SE DEBE A QUE DA A BUEN PRECIO Y SIEMPRE TRATA D. TENER UNA CANTIDAD SUFICIENTE PARA NO QUEDARLE MAL A SUS CLIENTES. ELL.  SOLICITA EL PRESTAMO PARA COMPRAR MÁS POLLOS Y ALIMENTO. AL MOMENTO D. SOLICITAR ESTE PRESTAMO SE SIENTE EMOCIONADA Y TIENE PLANEADO A CORTO PLAZO CONSTRUIRLE UN CUARTO A SU HIJA MAYOR Y PODER BRINDARLES A SUS HIJAS LOS ESTUDIOS QUE ELL. NO TUVO PARA QUE TENGAN UNA MEJOR CALIDAD D. VIDA Y PUEDAN VALERSE POR SI MISMAS.
OBSERVACIONES: EN L. FOTO L. SEÑORA ESTHEL. ES L. QUE NO SE VE BIEN.
texts.en:
This loan group is named ‘Quickly’ because they never imagined that they would receive services in such a short time. The group is located in the State of Mexico and it has 10 members. 

EstheL. L. is the group’s treasurer and studied until the 1st year of secondary school. She is a homemaker and has two daughters who are 6 years old and 4 months old.  For the past 4 years she has dedicated herself to raising and selling chickens; she comments that thanks to her investment in her chicken business, she was able to build her house, which is still not finished. She hopes that with this loan she will be able to invest more in her business, given that this is the season in which has the most sales. EstheL. sells her chickens in the El Tianguis community, and also sells to people from nearby communities who come to her home to make their purchases. She says that the success of her business is due to her good prices and that she always tries to ensure that she has enough products to maintain good customer relations. 

She is requesting this loan to purchase more chickens and feed. She is very excited to request this loan, and has short term plans to build a room for her eldest daughter; she also wants to be able to proviD. her daughters the education that she wasn’t afforded, so that they can have an improved quality of life and self-worth. 

Note: In the photo, EstheL. is the member who is not very visible.

loans.use: To purchase more chickens and feed.

loans.name: Maria Teresa

texts.es:
María Teresa de 32 años, vive en Santiago de María departamento de Usulután junto a su hijo de 5 años llamado Jefferson, es madre soltera y se dedica a la venta  de tortillas, negocio que comenzó por la necesidad de darle a su hijo lo necesario y velar por su bienestar.
Ella trabaja de 7:00 am a 8:00pm, la venta la realiza en su casa y en el mercado municipal  de Santiago;  María está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de maíz, gas que son los principales materiales para preparar las tortillas, con esta ayuda ella se impulsara con materiales en su inventario para aumentar la producción de tortillas.
Sueña con tener un negocio cada día mejor y estable, que sus ventas aumenten  y que no le falten los ingresos para poder darle a su hijo la alimentación necesaria y el desarrollo.
texts.en:
María Teresa is 32 years old.  She lives in Santiago de María, in Usulután department, with her 5 year-old son called Jefferson.  She is a single mother and sells tortillas.  She started her business as she needed to provide for her son and look after his well-being.

María works from 7.00am to 8.00pm.  She sells her tortillas from her home and in Santiago town market.  María is requesting a loan to buy corn and gas which are the key materials she needs to make her tortillas.  This help will drive her business forwards as she will have materials in her inventory to increase her tortilla production.

María dreams of having a business which is better and more stable every day.  She dreams of her sales increasing and of having enough income to provide her son with the food he needs and to ensure his development.

loans.use: To buy corn and gas

loans.name: Manos Trabajadoras Group

texts.es:
MANOS TRABAJADORAS – KIVA   

Carmen tiene 44 años de edad tiene 1 año siendo presidenta de la Alcancía comunal “MANOS TRABAJADORAS”, esta Alcancía tiene 3 años, de estar formada y actual mente esta conformado por 10 personas que le brindan todo el apoyo que necesita, Carmen Como presidenta los miembros de la Alcancía comunal se unieron a través de ser vecinos y hasta la fecha  tienen 3 años trabajando con Edaprospo-Prosperidad.                 
Carmen es madre casada tiene 2 hijos q son dependientes la señora tiene ya 9 años trabajando en  un puesto de golosinas en un colegio y también vende productos de belleza hace 3 años la señora Carmen es una persona trabajadora q a sabido sacar adelante a su familia junto a su esposo, ella quisiera un capital de trabajo extra para surtir, mejorar y agrandar su negocio para poder salir adelante como la persona trabajadora q se considera
texts.en:
Manos Trabajadoras – Kiva

Carmen is 44 years old.  She has been president of the “Manos Trabajadoras” community bank for one year.  This group has been together for three years and currently has ten members who provide it with all the support it needs.  The members of the group came together as they are neighbors and, to date, they have been working with Edaprospo-Prosperidad for 3 years.

Carmen is a married mother who has two dependent children.  She has been working in a candy stall in a school for 9 years.  She has also been selling beauty products for 3 years.  She is a hard-working person who has known how to get her family ahead in life, together with her husband.  She would like extra working capital to stock, improve and expand her business so that she can get ahead in life as the hard-working person she considers herself to be.

loans.use: To improve and expand her business

loans.name: Lidia Marina

texts.es:
Doña Lidia, resiD. en Santiago D. María, departamento D. Usulután, su familia está conformada por su esposo y cuatro hijos D. 19, 16, 14, 9 años D. edad, ella se dedica a la venta D. cosméticos tiene 42 años D. edad, trabaja en su casa y venD. los productos casa por casa y en los negocios, trabaja D. lunes a domingos D. 8:00am a 5:00pm, aprendió este negocio por iniciativa propia desD. hace 10 años.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra D. lociones, maquillaje, labiales, desodorante, entre otros que son D. uso personal, con esta inversión desea agradar a su clientela y motivarla a que le consuman más productos y D. esta manera seguir generando para su hogar los ingresos necesarios.
Ser una gran comerciante es su sueño, contar con muchos clientes y ayudar a sus hijos con los estudios y puedan superarse.
texts.en:
Lidia lives in Santiago D. María, in Usulután department.  She lives with her husband and four children aged 19, 16, 14 and 9.  Lidia sells cosmetics.  She is 42 years old.  She works from home and also sells her products door to door and in businesses.  She works from Monday to Sunday from 8.00am to 5.00pm.  She learned this business through her own initiative 10 years ago.

Lidia is requesting a loan to buy lotions, make-up, lipsticks, deodorant, and other personal use products.  With this investment she would like to please her customers and motiviate them to buy more products.  In this way, she hopes to continue making income for her household. 

Lidia's dream is to be a great saleswoman, to have lots of customers and to help her children with their studies and to get ahead in life.

loans.use: To buy lotions, make-up, lipsticks and deodorants

loans.name: Gisela

texts.es: Gisela, de 30 años, vive al lado de su esposo Walter de 25 años, que es minero y de sus 2 pequeños hijos, juntos se esfuerzan cada día por salir adelante. Hace más de 2 años, esta emprendedora mujer se dedica a la comercialización de ropa, sabanas, colchas, zapatos y zapatillas. Ella compra una vez al mes en un gran emporio comercial de la ciudad y trae por pedidos diferentes tipo de prendas; y luego sus ocasionales clientes le pagan al crédito. Le gusta mucho su negocio pues es tranquilo y le permite atender a sus pequeños hijos; además le genera considerables ganancias que le permiten ayudar a su esposo en los constantes gastos del hogar. Lo que no le gusta es que algunos clientes se retrasan en el pago puntual de sus deudas, pues se estanca su capital, pero al final le cancelan con intereses. Tiene muchos planes para el futuro como el de instalar un puesto de venta de ropa en el mercado de su zona, pero sabe que con mucho esfuerzo lo logrará. Es el  segundo crédito que tiene con MFP y promete pagar sus cuotas puntualmente ya que no quiere quedar mal con las personas que hicieron posible este aporte que le permitirá continuar trabajando en busca del progreso. Gisela tiene planeado invertir el crédito solicitado en la compra de mercadería en ropa y zapatillas que necesita para ofrecer lo mejor a sus clientes; además necesita abastecerse por campaña navideña.
texts.en: Gisela, 30, lives with Walter, her husband of 25 years, who is a miner and with their 2 small children, and together they work hard every day to get ahead. For more than 2 years, this enterprising woman has sold clothes, sheets, bedspreads, and shoes. She buys once a month at a big commercial center in the city and she brings back on order different types of garments; and then her customers pay her on credit. She really likes her business as it is peaceful and it allows her to look after her small children; in additional it generates a considerable profit which enables her to help her husband with the constant household expenses. What she doesn't like is that some customers fall behind in paying their debts, which then ties up her capital, but in the end they are settled with interest. She has a lot of plans for the future like setting up a stall selling clothes at the market in her area, and she knows that with a lot of effort she will succeed. This is the second loan that she has had with MFP and she promises to pay her installments on time as she doesn't want to give a bad impression to the people who have made this support possible which allows her to keep working in search of progress. Gisela plans to use the requested loan to purchase clothing and shoes which she needs to offer the best to her customers; in addition she needs to stock up for the Christmas campaign.

loans.use: To purchase clothing and shoes.

loans.name: Santa Cruz Group

texts.es: El grupo se llama Santa C., porque es el nombre de la comunidad. En la ciudad de Tehuacan en el estado de Puebla en México. El grupo está conformado por 12 integrantes. La sra. Ma. Araceli es la presidenta del grupo y de la cual se desarrolla esta historia, ella se dedica a la venta de alimentos y también tiene una estética, que inició hace cuatro meses. Solicita el prestamo para la compra de articulos de belleza y asi poder tener más variedad en sus productos y tener mejor servicios para asi poder realizar mejor su trabajo. Tiene 39 años, estudió hasta el 3er año de secundaria. Es madre soltera y tiene en total 1 hijo varon de 13 años de edad.Sus clientes opinan que tiene buen servicio por su carácter, y su local está centrico y tiene buen ambiente ya que siempre los recibe con una sonrisa, además cuenta con lo necesario para satisfacer sus necesidades.Al momento de solicitar este prestamo se siente alegre porque va a poder cumplir con las espectativas de sus clientes.Quiere seguir apoyadose económicamente para salir adelante ya que su hijo requiere atención especial.
texts.en: This group is called Santa C. because it is the name of the community located in the city of Tehuacan in the state of Puebla in Mexico. The group is made up of 12 members. Mrs. Ma. Araceli is the group's president and this story is about her. She sells food and also has a beauty parlor which she started four months ago. She is requesting this loan for the purchase of beauty supplies in order to have more variety in her products and have better services in order to better carry out her work. She is 39 years old, and she studied until the 3rd year of secondary school. She is a single mother and has one 13 year old son. Her clients think that she provides a good service for her character and her premises are central and have a good atmosphere as she always receives them with a smile. As well, she has what is necessary to satisfy their needs. At the moment of requesting this loan she feels happy because she is going to be able to fulfill the expectations of her clients. She wants to continue supporting herself economically to get ahead since her son requires special attention.

loans.use: For the purchase of beauty supplies.

loans.name: Josefina

texts.es: La Sra. S. es una persona muy entusiasta y trabajadora, tiene poco de haberse casado, tiene un niño pequeño y vive en casa de sus padres los cuales en este momento se encuentran separados asi que solo la mamá vive con ellos, el esposo trabaja en una funeraria de obrero y ella para contribuir en los gastos de la casa coloca un puesto de venta de ropa usada en una colonia popular donde se colocan varios puestos similiares, a ella le gusta mucho todo lo referente a ventas y como ha visto que le esta funcionando quiere el crédito para comprar mercancía y surtir bien su puesto asi tener mas ingresos para ella y su familia.
texts.en: Mrs. S. is an enthusiastic and hard-working woman who hasn’t been married for very long.  She has a small child and lives in her parents’ house.  However, her parents are separated so only her mother lives with them.  Her husband works in a funeral parlor and she contributes to the household expenses.  She has put up a stand to sell used clothing in a busy neighborhood where similar stands are set up. She likes all that is related to sales and since it is working out for her, she is requesting the loan to buy merchandise and supply her stand.  This will give her more earnings for herself and her family.

loans.use: To buy merchandise to supply her business of selling used clothing.

loans.name: Juana Mireya

texts.es: La Sra. M. es una mujer muy trabajadora y una madre muy responsable. Siempre al pendiente de la educación de sus hijos es por eso tomo la iniciativa de vender calzado por catalogo para contribuir al ingreso de su hogar si tener que descuidarlo debido a que su esposo tiene la mayor parte del dia laborando en una empresa dedicada ha hacer anuncio luminosos de neón es uno de los mejores coloboradores fue lo que expreso su jefe inmediato que esta muy agusto con el trabajo que el señor realiza. y su esposa para ayudarle tomo dicha iniciativa requiere el crédito para surtir pedido de zapatos que tiene encargados y tener mejor entrada económica en su hogar.
texts.en: Mrs M. is a very hard-working woman and a very responsible mother.  She is always keen on providing for her children's education which is why she took the initiative to sell footwear through catalogs.  She wanted to contribute to the household income without having to neglect her household as her husband is outside of the home most of the day working for a company making neon signs.  According to his immediate boss, who is very happy with the work he does, he is one of the company's best workers.  In order to help him, Mrs M. took this initiative.  She is requesting this loan to stock an order for shoes that she has outstanding and to improve her household economy.

loans.use: To stock an order for shoes that she has pending

loans.name: Eusebio Elias

texts.es: El Sr. Eusebio Elias R., es una persona que  vive con su esposa y su menor hija, el interes de el es construir una barda alrededor de su casa, para proteccion de su familia, y dar mas seguridad a su vivienda, ya que por donde el radica no hay mucho alumbrado, y dice que con la barda,  el se iria mas tranquilo a trabajar, ya que en ocasiones le toca trabajar doble turno o entrar en horario nocturno, de pronto el no podia juntar  el dinero para construir, pero al tramitar el credito con esta institucion, el siente que puede darle mas satisfaccion a su familia pensando en la seguridad de su hogar.  y asi no se preocuparia tanto y trabajaria con mas ganas sabiendo que su familia esta segura.
texts.en: Eusebio Elias R. lives with his wife and young daughter.  He would like to build a wall around his house to protect his family and provide his home with more security.  Where he lives there isn't much street lighting and he says that with the wall in place he would be able to go to work more comfortably as he often has to work double shifts or night shifts.  He couldn't get the money together to build this wall but the loan from our institution will allow him to do this.  This would please his family and would make his home safer.  In turn, this would mean that he wouldn't worry so much as he could go out to work knowing that his family was safe.

loans.use: To build a wall to protect his home

loans.name: El Corazon De Flor Group

texts.es: El grupo se llama El Corazón De Flor, porque es el nombre de una hija de una integrante, se ubica en la ciudad de Tehuacan en el estado de Puebla en México. El grupo está conformado por 9 integrantes. La sra. Leticia S. T. se dedica a la venta de alimentos, que inició hace cuatro años. Solicita el prestamo para la compra de ingredientes y asi poder tener más variedad en sus productos y realizar mejor su trabajo. Tiene 43 años, estudio hasta el 6to año de primaria. Es madre soltera y tiene en total 1 hijo varón de 11 años de edad. Sus clientes opinan que tiene buen servicio, buen sazón, y su local está céntrico, ya que está frente a un balneario, siempre los recibe con una sonrisa, además cuenta con lo necesario para satisfacer su paladar. Al momento de solicitar este prestamo se siente alegre porque va a poder cumplir con las espectativas de sus clientes. Quiere este credito para invertir en su negocio y asi obtener mayores ganancias. Tambien espera seguir apoyado económicamente a su familia con la ampliacion de su casa.
texts.en:
This group is called 'El Corazón De Flor' (Flor's Heart) because 'Flor' is the name of the daughter of one of the group's members.  The group is located in the city of Tehuacan, in the State of Puebla, in Mexico and has 9 members.

Mrs Leticia S.T. sells meals and she set up her business four years ago.  She is requesting this loan to buy ingredients so that she can offer more variety in her products and better carry out her work.  She is 43 years old and studied up to the 6th year of elementary school.  She is a single mother and has one son aged 11.  Leticia's customers say that she provides a good service and good-tasting food.  Her premises are centrally located and located opposite a spa.  She always greets her customers with a smile and provides food which satisfies their palates.  At the moment of requesting this loan, Leticia feels happy that she will be able to meet her customers' demands.  She would like to invest this loan in her business and thereby make more profits.  She also hopes to continue supporting her family financially and expanding her home.

loans.use: To buy merchandise and make meals

loans.name: Mujeres Emprendedoras - Saños Grande Group

texts.es:
Isabel V. M., Sociologa, madre soltera, 1 hijo, socia del grupo comunal: "Mujeres Emprendedoras-Saños GranD."
Isabel V., es sociologa D. profesion y trabajò varios ejerciendo esta carrera; a los 35 años D. edad tuvo a su ùnico hijo, al cual tuvo que criar y educar soL., pues el padre D. su hijo se desinteresò D. ellos y formò otro hogar. 
Trabajaba todo el dìa y su hijo se tenìa que quedar solo con L. niñera; conforme crecìa, siempre preguntaba por su padre, a pesar que elL. trataba D. llenarlo D. cariño; pero eso era suficiente, ya que L. carencia D. un padre no se pueD. llenar y menos con cosas materiales.
Cuando una D. sus hermanas falleciò, L. tristeza fue devastadora y no tenìa fuerzas para nada; pues eran muy unidas; èsta hermana le habìa dejado unas propiedades pero lamentablemente sus otras hermanas se lo quitaron todo y solo le dejaron 2 habitaciones  pequeñas para vivir; elL. no les reclamo nada, pues no le parecìa bien pelearse entre hermanas.
Posteriormente dejò D. trabajar y solo susistìa con L. pensiòn que recibìa, pero tenìa a su cargo a su menor hijo quièn estaba en edad escolar y el dinero no alcanzaba. En aquel entonces una D. sus hermanas tenìa una pequeña tienda donD. alquilaban vestidos y ternos, pero èsta hermana obtuvo una oportunidad D. trabajo en el extranjero y clausurò L. tienda; entonces se le ocurriò L. idea D. volver a abrir aquelL. tienda y poner un bazar, ya que su hermana habìa dejado algunas prendas en alquiler, telas y otros; asì Isabel confeccionò y comprò mas vestidos; D. este modo empezò con este negocio y hasta ahora le ha ido bien. Su anhelo es que este negocio crezca y pueda expandirse. 
(En L. foto Isabel V. esta en L. parte superior izquierda)
El uso del prèstamo serà para incremento D. capital.
texts.en:
Isabel V. M., sociologist, single mother, 1 son, member of the community bank "Mujeres Emprendedoras-Saños GranD.".
Isabel V. is a sociologist by profession and she practiced this career for a number of years. She had her only son when she was 35, and she has to raise and educate him alone as the father of her child lost interest in them and started another home. 
She used to work all day and her son was looked after by a babysitter. As her son got older, he would always ask for his father despite the fact that she tried to give him all the affection he needed. But that was enough, though the affection of a father can't be replaced, and certainly not with material things. 
When one of her sisters passed away, her grief was devastating and she hadn't the strength to do anything; they had been very close. This sister had left her some properties but, unfortunately, her other sisters took everything and only left her with two little rooms to live in. She did not claim anything else because it did not seem right to her to fight with her sisters. 
Subsequently, she stopped working and lived only on the pension that she received. But, she had her small son in her care and he was of school age and the money did not stretch far enough. At that time, one of her sisters had a small store where she rented out dresses and suits, but this sister got the opportunity to work abroad and closed the store. Then the idea occurred to Isabel that she could reopen this store and have a bazaar, as her sister had left behind some rentable garments, cloth, and other things. So, Isabel maD. and bought more dresses, and in this way she began her business and it has been going well to date. Her wish is that the business will grow and she can expand it. 
(In the photo, Isabel V. is in the upper left.) 
She will use the loan for business capital.

loans.use: Business capital

loans.name: Los Tamarindos 1 Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama Los Tamarindos 1 porque en el lugar donde se reúne el grupo hay varios árboles de tamarindo, está ubicado en una comunidad de Morelos en México. El grupo está conformado por 11 integrantes.Adriana Beltrán V.  es integrante del grupo tiene 49 años, estudió hasta el 3er año de secundaria, es comerciante de cerámica, y tiene un total de 5 hijos; una mujer y cuatro varones, ella se dedica a la venta de cerámica, además  colchas y artículos de temporada,  negocio que inicio hace 5 años para apoyar en la economía de la familia, ya que su esposo es chofer de microbús y muchas veces no les alcanzaba el sueldo de su esposo para cubrir sus necesidades pues sus hijos aun estudiaban, ahora  solo uno de sus hijos está con ella y va a estudiar la carrera de contador, quiere este préstamo para comprar  unas fuentes de cerámica que le han estado solicitando sus clientes, anteriormente vendía sus productos casa por casa, ahora ya está establecida en un solo lugar y la gente va a su negocio a buscar piezas de cerámica, al momento de solicitar el préstamo se siente contenta porque va a poder surtir mercancía que le habían solicitado, con esto pretende ampliar su negocio, con las ganancias que obtenga piensa apoyar  a su hijo con los gastos de la escuela.
texts.en:
This group is called Los Tamarindos 1 (The Tamarinds 1) because in the place where the group meets there are several tamarind trees. It is located in the community of Morales in Mexico.

The group is made up of 11 members. Adriana Beltrán V., a member of the group, is 49 years old. She studied through the third year of secondary school, is a seller of ceramics, and has a total of 5 children, a daughter and four sons.

She is involved in the sale of ceramics as well as bedspreads and seasonal articles. She began the business 5 years ago in order to support her family. Her husband is the driver of a microbus. Often his salary didn’t cover their needs since their children were still studying. Now, only one of their children is with her and he is going to study an accounting course.

She wants this loan in order to purchase ceramic items that her customers have been asking for. Previously, she sold her products door-to-door. Now, she has established a shop and people go to her business to look for ceramic pieces. Having applied for the loan, she is happy because she is going to be able to stock merchandise that has been requested. With this she aspires to enlarge her business. With the earnings she obtains she wants to help her son with his school expenses.

loans.use: In order to purchase ceramic items.

loans.name: Elizabeth Cecilia

texts.es: Esta pequeña historia data de una joven estudiante que tiene un gran espíritu por salir adelante, Elizabeth T. de 20 años de edad, estudia ciencias de la comunicación  en la universidad Nacional Mayor de San Marcos. Ella se esmera todo el día para poder obtener buenas calificaciones y estar entre los primeros de su clase, nos comenta que escogió estudiar esta carrera ya que le gusta interactuar mucho con las personas, de tal manera que puede aprender de ella y a su vez  compartir sus conocimientos, terminando sus estudios le gustaría viajar a Brasil a para poder realizar  una especialización más profunda sobre sus estudios. A su vez estudia ingles por el cual el reciente préstamo es para pagar sus estudios. Elizabeth T. es una joven estudiante con  grandes deseos de superación,  con metas bien establecidas y con gran futuro profesional.
texts.en: This little anecdote is about a young student who has a strong desire to get ahead.  Elizabeth T., 20, studies communication sciences at the National University of San Marcos.  She works hard every day to get good grades and to be one of the top students in her class. She tells us that she chose to study in this area because she very much enjoys interacting with people so that they can learn from her, and at the same time, share their knowledge with her.  Once she finishes her studies she would like to travel to Brazil so that she could complete further studies in communications.  At the same time she is studying English; a recent loan that she took is to pay for those studies.  Elizabeth T. is a young student who has a strong desire to succeed, with well-established goals and a great professional future.

loans.use: to pay educational expenses

loans.name: Iván

texts.es:
Iván tiene 27 años de edad, es soltero y no tiene carga familiar, reside en casa de sus familiares, ubicada en el sector 9 de Octubre, una zona urbano marginal de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

El reside en el lugar desde hace  3 años y durante este tiempo ha logrado instalar un pequeño taller, en donde suele confeccionar mochilas. El estudió confección y luego trabajó en Lima para una empresa especializada en el rubro, con el tiempo decidió independizarse y abrir su propia empresa, actualmente su  negocio viene desarrollándose favorablemente. 

Iván desea ampliar su producción adquiriendo  materiales (como cierres, telas, moldes , entre otros)  con las cuales piensa satisfacer la cantidad de pedidos con la que actualmente cuenta ya que durante la campaña navideña la demanda por sus productos suele aumentar.
texts.en:
Iván, 27, is single and doesn't have any family responsibilities.  He lives with relatives in their home, located in sector 9 de Octubre, an urban zone on the outskirts of the city of Chiclayo, capital of the Lambayeque region.

He has lived there for the past 3 years and during this time has succeded in setting up a small workhop where he  makes satchels.  He studied sewing and then worked in Lima for a business specializing in that area.  He soon decided to go out on his own and open a business which currently  is developing well.

Iván would like to increase his production with supplies (such as zippers, fabric, patterns, etc) and that is how he plans to fill the orders that he currently has.  He is counting on the Christmas season when the demand for his products usually grows.

loans.use: To purchase supplies so that he can increase his sewing business and the sales of satchels

loans.name: Gladys Luz

texts.es:
Gladys tiene 32 años de edad, es separada y tiene dos hijos, vive en el sector La Zaranda, una zona rural del distrito de Pítipo, provincia de Ferreñafe, sus actividades principales son la agricultura y la crianza de animales, la zona en donde vive queda ubicada a 45 minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica desde hace cinco años a la crianza y comercialización de animales menores. Ella cría ovejas y chivos en un potrero que posee, allí ellos se alimentan de algarroba (fruto del árbol algarrobo, abundante en la zona). Cuando alcanzan su grado máximo de desarrollo ella los ofrece en venta a los negociantes que frecuentan el lugar, esta actividad es la única que le provee de ingresos económicos, por lo que da lo mejor de si para mantener su negocio.

Gladys desea adquirir alimento balanceado para complementar su nutrición y de esta manera percibir mayores ingresos por sus ventas. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles con los cuales planea lograr su objetivo y satisfacer a la demanda que suele incrementarse por estas fechas navideñas.

Gladys ya ha trabajado anteriormente con un préstamo financiado por el Fondo Kiva, a través de Edpyme Alternativa y su producto Capital Semilla. Con el dinero de aquel préstamo pudo adquirir alimento para sus animales. Gracias a esa colaboración su negocio ha podido tomar un pequeño impulso para empezar a desarrollarse, lo que la hace sentir contenta y agradecida con los prestamistas de Kiva.
texts.en:
Gladys is 32 years old, separated, and has two children.  She lives in the La Zaranda section, a rural area in the Pítipo district, Ferreñafe province.  Her main activities are farming and raising animals.  The area where she lives is located 45 minutes from the city of Chiclayo.

For five years she has been engaged in raising and marketing small animals.  She raises sheep and goats in a corral she has.  The animals are fed with carob pods (fruit of the carob tree, which grows freely in the area).  When they are fully developed, she offers them for sale to merchants who come by regularly.  This is the only activity that provides her with income, for which reason she gives her best to maintain her business.

Gladys would like to purchase balanced feed to complement their nutrition, and thus bring in greater earnings from her sales.  For this reason she considers it advantageous to request a loan of 1,500 new soles from Edpyme Alternativa, which she plans to use to meet her objective and satisfy demand, which usually increases as the Christmas holidays approach.

Gladys previously worked with a loan financed by Kiva, through Edpyme Alternativa and Capital Semilla (seed capital), one of its product lines.  With the funds from that loan, she purchased feed for her animals.  Thanks to that collaboration, her business picked up a little momentum and began to develop, which makes her happy and grateful for Kiva’s loan officers.

loans.use: To buy feed to expand her business (raising and selling animals)

loans.name: Rosa Giovanna

texts.es:
Rosa tiene 22 años de edad, es soltera y reside junto a su madre en el sector La Zaranda, una zona rural del distrito de Pítipo, provincia de Ferreñafe, sus actividades principales son la agricultura y la crianza de animales, la zona en donde vive queda ubicada a 45 minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica desde hace tres años a la crianza y comercialización de animales menores. Ella cría ovejas y chivos al aire libre, en un potrero que posee, allí ellos se alimentan de algarroba (fruto del árbol algarrobo, abundante en la zona) y diversas hierbas. Cuando alcanzan su grado máximo de desarrollo ella los ofrece en venta al público en general en el Mercado Moshoqueque, esta actividad es la única que le provee de ingresos económicos, por lo que da lo mejor de si para mantener su negocio.

Rosa desea adquirir alimento balanceado para complementar su nutrición y de esta manera percibir mayores ingresos por sus ventas. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000  nuevos soles con los cuales planea lograr su objetivo y satisfacer a la demanda que suele incrementarse por estas fechas navideñas.
texts.en:
Rosa, 22, is single and lives with her mother in the La Zaranda sector, a rural zone in Pítipo district, Ferreñafe province.  Her main activities are farming and animal raising.  The zone where she lives is 45 minutes away from the city of Chiclayo.

For the last three years she has been raising small farm animals to sell.  She raises sheep and goat outdoors in a pasture she has.  There they feed on algarroba (fruit of the carob tree which is abundant in the area) and various grasses.
