When they reach their maximum level of development she sells them to the general public at the Moshoqueque Market.  This activity is her only source of income so she does her best to maintain her business.

Rosa wants to buy nutritionally balanced animal feed to complement their nutrition so that she will get higher earnings at the time they are sold.  She has, therefore, asked Edpyme Alternativa for a 1000 new sol loan with which to reach this goal and meet customer demand which tends to increase during the Christmas season.

loans.use: To buy animal feed.

loans.name: Florencio

texts.es:
Florencio tiene 65 años de edad, es soltero y reside junto a su hermana en el distrito de Santa Rosa, una zona mayoritariamente pesquera que se encuentra situada a más de veinticinco minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica desde hace que era joven a trabajar en labores agrícolas. El cuenta con un terreno agrícola situado en la localidad denominada Laguna Grande, ubicada a cinco minutos del lugar en donde reside. Allí suele sembrar camote y alfalfa, gracias a estos cultivos puede sacar adelante a su familia y solventar sus gastos personales.

Florencio tiene mucha experiencia en el manejo de estos cultivos. Actualmente desea brindarles mantenimiento aplicándoles fertilizantes para garantizarse una buena cosecha. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles con los cuales piensa adquirir los fertilizantes que necesita para lograr su objetivo.
texts.en:
Florencio is sixty-five years old, single and resides with his sister in Santa Rosa, which is mainly a fishing district. It is located more than twenty five minutes from the city of Chiclayo.

Since he was young he has dedicated himself to farm work. He has a plot of land in the locality called Laguna Grande, located five minutes from where he lives. There he usually plants sweet potatoes and alfalfa. Thanks to these crops he can help his family get ahead and pay for his expenses.

Florencio has a lot of experience handling these crops. Currently he wishes to maintain them by applying fertilizers to guarantee a good harvest. Because of this he believes it is advisable to request a loan of 1500 soles from Edpyme Alternativa, with which he will purchase the fertilizers that he needs to achieve his objective.

loans.use: The purchase of fertilizers to maintain his sweet potato and alfalfa crops.

loans.name: María Elsa

texts.es:
María Elsa tiene 29 años D. edad, es casada y resiD. junto a su esposo y a sus cuatro hijos en el caserío San José del distrito D. Mórrope, una zona agrícoL. y comercial que está poblada por gente humilD.  y trabajadora. Se encuentra ubicada a más D. una hora D. L. ciudad D. Chiclayo.

ElL. cuenta con algunos animales menores, los cuales cría en un ambiente ubicado en L. parte posterior D. su domicilio. Los alimenta en base D. granos y pastos naturales y cuando estos alcanzan un buen nivel D. desarrollo los ofrece en venta a los negociantes que suelen visitar L. zona en donD. resiD.. ElL. ya lleva trabajando durante más D. tres años en esta actividad.

 L. crianza y venta D. animales es L. más importante fuente D. ingresos con L. que cuenta, gracias a elL. ayuda a su esposo, quien trabaja como jornalero en los campos D. cultivo cercanos, con el sostenimiento D. L. economía D. su familia. 

Actualmente desea adquirir alimento balanceado y realizar arreglos en sus corrales con L. finalidad D. mejorar L. crianza D. estos animales y percibir mayores ingresos por sus ventas, sobretodo durante esta temporada naviD.ña, que es cuando L. demanda aumenta. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito D. 2000 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.
texts.en:
María Elsa, 29, is married living with her husband and four children in San José, Mórrope district, a rural and commercial zone inhabited by humble, hard working people.  It is located more than an hour away from the city of Chiclayo.

She has a few small farm animals that she raises in an area of her backyard.  She feeds them basic grains and natural grasses.  When they reach their ideal level of development she sells them to the various merchants that frequent the area where she lives.  She has been working in this occupation now for over three years.

Raising animals for sale is the most important source of income she has.  Thanks to it she’s able to help her husband, who works as a field hand in nearby farms, support the family.

She wants to acquire nutritionally balanced feed and make some improvements to the corrals so that the animals will grow better and she will earn higher income from their sales, especially during the Christmas season, which is when demand increases.  She has, therefore, asked Edpyme Alternativa for a 2000 new sol loan that will help her reach this goal.

loans.use: To buy nutritionally balanced animal feed and to make improvements to the animal pens.

loans.name: María Consuelo

texts.es:
María Consuelo es una madre de familia de 38 años de edad que reside junto a su esposo y a sus hijos en el sector Fundo Los Ayala del caserío Punto 9 del distrito de Lambayeque, una zona agrícola poblada por gente humilde  y trabajadora. Se encuentra ubicada a más de media hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Ella cuenta con algunos animales menores, los cuales cría en un ambiente ubicado en la parte posterior de su domicilio. Los alimenta en base de granos y pastos naturales y cuando estos alcanzan un buen nivel de desarrollo los ofrece en venta a los negociantes que suelen visitar la zona en donde reside. Esta actividad es la más importante fuente de ingresos con la que cuenta, gracias a ella ayuda a su esposo, que es agricultor, con el sostenimiento de la economía de su familia. 

Actualmente desea adquirir alimento balanceado para mejorar la crianza de estos animales y percibir mayores ingresos por sus ventas, sobretodo durante esta temporada navideña, que es cuando la demanda aumenta. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.
texts.en:
María Consuelo is a 38-year-old mother who lives with her husband and their children in the Fundo Los Ayala area of the Punto 9 settlement in Lambayeque District.  This is a farming area populated by humble, hardworking people.  It is located more than a half hour from the city of Chiclayo.

María has some small animals which she raises in an area behind her house.  She feeds them natural grains and grasses, and when they grow to a good size she offers them for sale to the businessmen who often visit the area where she lives.  This is María's most important source of income, and thanks to it she helps her husband, who is a farmer, to support their family.

Right now she wants to buy balanced feed to improve the animals' growth so she will earn more from their sale, especially during this Christmas season, which is when demand increases.  For this reason, she decided it was a good idea to ask Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 2000 new soles to help her achieve her goal.

loans.use: Buy balanced feed to improve business raising and selling animals

loans.name: Johanna Yeslye

texts.es:
Johanna es una joven de 19 años de edad que reside junto a su familia en el distrito de Lambayeque, una zona de regular movimiento comercial que se encuentra ubicada a veinte minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza y cosméticos por catálogo, ella cuenta con un grupo de clientes que le compran sus productos con frecuencia, mientras más pedidos le realizan obtiene mas puntos de parte de la empresa que le provee los productos y por consiguiente obtiene mayores ganancias. Por este motivo ella siempre se esfuerza por obtener cada vez más clientes.

Johanna desea contar con un capital estable para adquirir mas productos y ampliar su stock fijo de cosméticos que tiene en su vivienda, esto le permite a sus clientes adquirir los productos que necesitan rápidamente sin tener que esperar hasta fin de mes, que es cuando le entregan los pedidos. Para lograr su objetivo ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles que le ayuden a conseguir su meta.
texts.en:
Johanna is a young lady (19 years old) who lives with her family in Lambayeque District, an area with regular business activity which is located twenty minutes from the city of Chiclayo.

She sells beauty products and cosmetics by catalog.  She has a group of customers who buy her products frequently, and the more orders they place the more points she earns from the company that provides the products, and she consequently has higher earnings.  For this reason she always works to win more customers.

Johanna wants steady capital so she can acquire more products and expand her regular cosmetics stock that she keeps in her home.  This allows her customers to obtain the products they need rapidly without having to wait until the end of the month, which is when her orders arrive.  To achieve this, she has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 1000 new soles that will help her reach her goal.

loans.use: Purchase cosmetics to expand catalog sales business

loans.name: Alex William

texts.es:
Alex es un padre de familia de  26 años de edad que vive junto a su esposa en el distrito de Paiján, un distrito comercial que se encuentra ubicada en la provincia de Ascope en la región La Libertad, se encuentra ubicado a dos horas y media de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.  

Alex cuenta con una mototaxi, un vehículo motorizado consistente en una motocicleta que lleva anexada una cabina para realizar actividades de transporte. Con este vehículo el brinda servicio de transporte de carga y pasajeros dentro de su  localidad y con las zonas aledañas. El negocio es su fuente principal de ingresos con la que cuenta para sacar adelante a su familia.

Alex desea realizar algunas reparaciones y brindar mantenimiento a su mototaxi, ya que el continuo uso y el estado accidentado de los caminos de la zona ha hecho que esta empiece a sufrir algunas fallas. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles.

Alex es una persona que goza de buenas referencias por parte de sus vecinos y conocidos, es una persona trabajadora y responsable.
texts.en:
Alex is a 26-year-old father who lives with his wife in Paiján district, a commercial area located in Ascope Province of La Libertad Region.  This site is two and a half hours from the city of Chiclayo, capital of Lambayeque Region.  

Alex has a mototaxi, a motorized vehicle consisting of a motorcycle with an attached cabin for transportation activities.  With this vehicle, he offers transportation services for cargo and passengers in town and to neighboring areas.  The business is his main source of income for making ends meet for his family.

Alex wants to make some repairs and do maintenance work on his mototaxi since continual use and the rough roads in the area have caused it to start having some problems.  For this reason, he thought it a good idea to ask Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 1000 new soles.

Alex has good references from his neighbors and friends.  He is a hardworking, responsible person.

loans.use: Repair and maintenance costs for mototaxi

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
Julia tiene 47 años de edad, es casada y reside junto a su esposo y a sus cinco hijos en el caserío Hualtaco del distrito agrícola de Tambogrande, una zona situada en la región Piura, a más de cuatro horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

Ella cuenta con ganado ovino y vacuno, los cuales cría en un ambiente ubicado en la parte exterior de su domicilio. Los alimenta en base de pastos naturales y cuando estos alcanzan un buen nivel de desarrollo los ofrece en venta a los negociantes que suelen visitar la zona en donde reside. Esta actividad es la más importante fuente de ingresos con la que cuenta, gracias a ella ayuda a su esposo, que es agricultor, con el sostenimiento de la economía de su familia. 

Actualmente desea adquirir alimento balanceado para mejorar la crianza de estos animales y percibir mayores ingresos por sus ventas. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.
texts.en:
Julia, 47, is married living with her husband and five children in Hualtaco which is in the agricultural district of Tambogrande, an area in Piura region, over four hours from the city of Chiclayo, Lambayeque region’s capital.

She has cattle and sheep that she raises in her back yard.  She feeds them natural grasses and when they reach ideal development she sells them to merchants who tend to come by the area where she lives.  This activity is her most important source of income.  Thanks to it she is able to help her husband, who is a farmer, to support the family.

She wants to acquire nutritionally balanced feed to improve the growth of the animals and earn higher income from their sale.  She has, therefore, asked Edpyme Alternativa, for a 1500 new sol loan that will help her meet this goal.

loans.use: To buy nutritionally balanced animal feed.

loans.name: Jesús María

texts.es:
Jesús María es una madre de famiulia de 55 años de edad que reside junto a su esposo y a su última hija en el distrito de Las Lomas, un distrito agrícola que se encuentra ubicado en la región Piura, se encuentra ubicado aproximadamente a cuatro horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

Ella cuenta con una bodega instalada en su domicilio. Allí ella ofrece a sus vecinos y público en general una diversidad de productos de consumo diario, entre artículos de primera necesidad y abarrotes, a precios cómodos y con un buen servicio. Debido al tiempo que ya lleva funcionando la bodega cuenta con bastante acogida por parte de sus vecinos. Gracias a ella, Jesús ayuda a su esposo con el sostenimiento de la economía de su familia.

Jesús desea ampliar su negocio adquiriendo más productos que le permitan satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes, sobretodo durante esta temporada navideña. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles con los cuales planea lograr su objetivo.
texts.en:
Jesús María, 55, is a mother living with her husband and youngest daughter in Las Lomas district, a farming district in Piura region, located about four hours from the city of Chiclayo, Lambayeque region’s capital.

She has a grocery store installed in her house.  She offers her neighbors and the general public diverse basic, daily use items, among which are first need items and groceries, at reasonable prices and with good customer service.  Because of the time she’s been in business the store is well received by her neighbors.  Thanks to it, Jesús is able to help her husband support the family.

Jesús would like to expand the business acquiring more stock items to meet customer demand, especially during the Christmas holidays.  She has, therefore, asked Edpyme Alternativa for a 1500 new sol loan that she plans to use to reach her goal.

loans.use: To buy stock items for her store.

loans.name: José Avelino

texts.es:
José Avelino es un padre de familia de 50 años de edad que reside junto a su esposa y a sus hijos en una zona rural del distrito de Las Lomas, un distrito agrícola que se encuentra ubicado en la región Piura, se encuentra ubicado aproximadamente a cuatro horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

Se dedica desde muy joven a trabajar en labores agrícolas. El cuenta con una pequeña parcela de cultivo en donde ha instalado el sembrío de arroz. José se vale de esta actividad para sacar adelante la economía de su familia, por ello trata siempre de mantener a su actividad trabajando del mejor modo posible. El ya cuenta con varios años trabajando en esta actividad, por ello conoce bastante sobre el manejo de estos cultivos.

José desea adquirir fertilizantes para brindar mantenimiento a su cultivo y así garantizarse una buena cosecha, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles con los cuales piensa realizar su meta.
texts.en:
José Avelino, 50, is a father living with his wife and children in a rural area of Las Lomas district, an agricultural district located in Piura region, located about four hours from the city of Chiclayo, Lambayeque region’s capital.

He’s been a farmer since very young.  He has a small piece of farm land where he grows rice.  José counts on this activity to support his family so always makes an effort to keep the business working in the best possible way.  He has many years experience working in this line of work so he is quite knowledgeable about handling these crops.

José wants to get fertilizers to maintain the crops thus guaranteeing a good harvest.  He has, therefore, asked Edpyme Alternativa for a 1000 new sol loan that he plans to use to reach his goal.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
Rosa es una madre de familia de 69 años de edad que reside junto a su esposo en el caserío Bajo Cruceta del distrito agrícola de Tambogrande, una zona situada en la región Piura, a más de cuatro horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

Ella cuenta con aves de corral, las cuales cría en un ambiente ubicado en la parte exterior de su domicilio. Las alimenta en base de granos y pastos naturales y cuando estas alcanzan un buen nivel de desarrollo las ofrece en venta a los negociantes que suelen visitar la zona en donde reside. 

Esta actividad es la más importante fuente de ingresos con la que cuenta, gracias a ella ayuda a su esposo, que es agricultor, con el sostenimiento de la economía de su familia. Actualmente desea adquirir alimento balanceado para mejorar la crianza de estos animales y percibir mayores ingresos por sus ventas, sobretodo durante esta temporada que es cuando la demanda aumenta. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 500 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.
texts.en:
Rosa, 69, is a mother living with her husband in Bajo Cruceta settlement in the farming district of Tambogrande, an area located in Piura region, over four hours from the city of Chiclayo, Lambayeque region’s capital.

She has barnyard fowl that she raises in her back yard.  She feeds them basic grains and natural grasses and when they reach ideal development she sells them to merchants that tend to visit the area where she lives.

This activity is her most important source of income.  Thanks to it she is able to help her husband, who is a farmer, support the family.  She wants to get nutritionally balanced feed to improve the development of these animals so that income from their sale will be higher, especially during the Christmas season when demand increases.  She has, therefore, asked Edpyme Alternativa for a 500 new sol loan that will help her reach her goal.

loans.use: To buy nutritionally balanced animal feed.

loans.name: Policarpio

texts.es:
Policarpio es una padre de familia de 46 años de edad que reside junto a su esposa y a sus tres hijos en el caserío Bajo Cruceta del distrito agrícola de Tambogrande, una zona situada en la región Piura, a más de cuatro horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

El cuenta con algunos animales menores, los cuales cría en un ambiente ubicado en la parte exterior de su domicilio. Los alimenta en base de granos y pastos naturales y cuando estos alcanzan un buen nivel de desarrollo los ofrece en venta a los negociantes que suelen visitar la zona en donde reside. Usualmente cría ovejas, cerdos y aves de corral.

Esta actividad es la más importante fuente de ingresos con la que cuenta, por ello siempre trata de cuidarla del mejor modo posible. Actualmente el desea adquirir alimento balanceado para mejorar la crianza de estos animales y percibir mayores ingresos por sus ventas, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 500 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.
texts.en:
Policarpio, 46, is a father living with his wife and three children in the Bajo Cruceta settlement in the agricultural district of Tambogrande, a zone in Piura region, over four hours from the city of Chiclayo, Lambayeque region’s capital.

He has some small farm animals that he raises in his yard.  He feeds them grains and natural grasses and when they reach ideal development levels he sells them to merchants that tend to visit the area where he lives.  He has most recently raised sheep, pigs and barnyard fowl.

This activity is his most important source of income so he always tries to do the best job possible to care for it.  He wants to get nutritionally balanced feed to improve their growth and get higher sale prices.  He has, therefore, asked Edpyme Alternativa for a 500 new sol loan that will help him reach his goal.

loans.use: To buy nutritionally balanced animal feed.

loans.name: Victor Nicolas

texts.es:
Víctor tiene 56 años de edad, es separado y vive solo en la ciudad de Chiclayo, ciudad bastante conocida por su movimiento comercial y de transporte, es la capital de la región Lambayeque.

Se dedica a trabajar desde hace más de diez años vendiendo sandalias y zapatillas en el exterior del mercado del distrito de Pomalca, un distrito agrícola situado a quince minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo. Todos los días viaja hacia ese centro de abasto para comercializar la mercadería que previamente ha adquirido en el Mercado Modelo de la ciudad de Chiclayo. Esta actividad es su única fuente de ingreso, por lo que siempre trata de mantenerla de la mejor manera.

Víctor desea adquirir mas mercadería para ampliar su negocio, ya que durante los meses de verano la demanda por las sandalias suele aumentar. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1200 nuevos soles.

Víctor ya ha tenido un crédito financiado por el Fondo Kiva, a través de Edpyme Alternativa y su producto Capital Semilla. Con el dinero de aquel préstamo pudo adquirir mas mercadería para ampliar su negocio. Gracias a esa colaboración su negocio ha podido tomar un pequeño impulso para empezar a desarrollarse, lo que le hace sentirse contento y agradecido con los prestamistas de Kiva.
texts.en:
Víctor, 56, is separated and lives alone in the city of Chiclayo, a city that is quite well known because of its commercial movement and as a transportation hub; it’s the capital of Lambayeque region.

He has worked for over ten years selling sandals and slippers in the outdoor market in Pomalca district, a farming district located fifteen minutes from Chiclayo.  He goes to the wholesale foodstuffs market every day to sell his wares which he has previously purchased in Chiclayo’s Modelo Market.  This activity is his only source of income so he always works to maintain it in the best possible way.

Víctor would like to buy more merchandise for his business because during the summer months demand for sandals increases.  He has, therefore, asked Edpyme Alternativa for a 1200 new sol loan.

Víctor has had a previous Kiva funded loan through Edpyme Alternativa and its Seed Capital program.  With money from that loan he was able to buy more merchandise to expand his business.  Thanks to that collaboration his business got a small push to start developing which makes him happy and grateful to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To buy sandals.

loans.name: Marvet

texts.en:
Marvet A. was born in Tadjikistan. She is a widow and a mother of four sons and one daughter, who was adopted by Marvet and is the most loving child. She graduated from a Linguistic institute and worked as a librarian. At the age of 21, Marvet got married and soon became the mother of four sons. In order to help her husband to cover expenses for their large family, she left her job and started her business in land cultivating. 

In 1980, Marvet decided to make her dream come true – she adopted little girl, who became part of the big happy family.  Unfortunately, in 1984 tragedy broke all the plans of Marvet’s family – her husband died in a car accident and she became the only bread-winner for her children.  But Marvet didn’t lose her courage and has applied all her efforts to give her children all they need. 

In order to find a better place to live in, in 1995 Marvet and her family moved to Kyrgyzstan, to Oktyabrskoe village. She worked as a milker and was rewarded with a little house by the local administration, where she lives today. In order to find a means of subsistence for her family, Marvet decided to engage in livestock breeding, starting with the purchase of one calf. She worked hard and managed to enlarge her farm to two milk cows and eighteen sheep.   Her business generates a profit of 5,000 KGS a month from selling milk and meat products. 

Now, Marvet has applied for a loan of 60,000 KGS to purchase two milk cows, which will allow her to increase milk sales. In the future, she dreams to purchase her own house in Karabalta town.    

Bai-Tushum and Partners is one of the leading Microfinance Institutions in Kyrgyzstan. Bai-Tushum contributes to the economic development of the Kyrgyz Republic through the delivery of microfinance services in rural and urban areas that aim to increase employment and meet the interests of its clients and investors.

loans.use: To purchase two milk cows

loans.name: Samira

texts.ru:
Samira Z. 28 let. Ona vishla zamuj i seychas imeyet 1 rebonka. Samira yavlyayetsya IDP personom ona pereselenec iz Kalbadjara, ranshe ona projivala v Baku qorode no seychas posle zamujestva ona jivet v Absheron regione vmeste so svoyey semyoy.

Samira uje 4 qoda zanimayetsya konsalting biznessom. Eto uje vtoraya ssuda Samiri v perviy raz ona brala $ 1200 i ona ochen blagodarna lenderam za ssudu. Seychas ona nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit  novuyu pechatnuyu mashinu i printerniy apparat dlya razvitiya svoyeqo biznessa.
texts.en: Samira Z. is 28 years old, married with one child.  Recently, she moved from Baku and lives with her family close to Kalbajar in the Absheron district. For four years, she has been in the consulting business. This is her second loan and with her first loan borrowed $1,200 and she is very thankful for the help. Currently, she needs $2,000 AZN to purchase a computer with printer.

loans.use: Purchase new computer and printer

loans.name: Kenzhebubu

texts.en:
Kenzhebubu T. is a 57-years-old widow with four children.  Her family has been engaged in cattle breeding for the past 15 years, which is the only mean of subsistence for them. They started this business with the initial capital of 30,000 Kyrgyz Soms and managed to earn 6,000 Kyrgyz Soms monthly. To reduce expenses for the livestock's foraging, Kenzhebubu pastures her livestock in the mountainous areas with native grasses. Also, she works as a sorter of beans in the seasonal periods at the local processing plant. 

Now Kenzhebubu is applying for a loan of 70,000 Kyrgyz Soms to buy bull calves for fattening and reselling. With the revenues, she plans to broaden her business by means of breeding. 

Bai-Tushum and Partners uses Kiva funding to target the especially vulnerable population. Bai-Tushum and Partners is one of the leading Microfinance Institutions in Kyrgyzstan. As a reliable financial partner, Bai-Tushum contributes to the economic development of the Kyrgyz Republic through the delivery of microfinance services in rural and urban areas that lead to increased employment and meet the interests of its clients and investors.

loans.use: To buy bull calves for fattening and breeding

loans.name: Elkhan

texts.ru:
Elkhan H. 24 qoda. On ne jenat i jivet v Absheron regione vmeste so svoyey semyoy. Elkhan uchitsya v universitete i rabotayet chtobi oplatit svoyu uchebu.

Elkhan uje 3 qoda kak rabotayet v etom biznesse prodaji odejdi. Seychas on nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit zimniyu odejdu dlya pereprodaji. Elkhan etim samim xochet uvelichti svoy mesechniy doxod ta kak yemu ne xvotayet deneq dlya uchebi.
texts.en:
Elkhan Huseynov is 24 years old.  He is not married and lives in the Absheron region together with his family.  Elkhan is studying at the university and works to pay his tuition.

Elkhan has been doing his business for three years now by selling clothing.  At this time he needs 2000 AZN to buy winter clothing for resale.  By doing that Elkhan wants to increase his monthly income because he needs extra money to pay for his tuition.

loans.use: To purchase clothing for resale

loans.name: Wilson

texts.en: Wilson is a twenty-seven-year old ambitious man with a child, living in his own house in Fort Portal, Uganda.  He is in motorcycle transport and farming, with an experience of three years.  With his earnings, he has been able to buy a motorcycle of his own.  His business dream is to own at least five motorcycles in the next six years so as to increase on his income. William needs the loan to buy a motorcycle.

loans.use: To buy motorcycle for transport business

loans.name: Julius

texts.en: Julius is a thirty-six year-old man, married with seven children, living in his permanent house in Fort Portal, Uganda. He has a retail shop and a dairy and he has been in these businesses for ten years now, which has enabled him to pay school fees for his children.  His business wish is to become a wholesaler, although he still has challenges in finances.  Julius needs the loan to buy a motorcycle for transport purposes.

loans.use: To purchase a motorcycle

loans.name: Christine

texts.en: Christine is a thirty-one-year-old single mother, living in a rented house in Fort Portal, Uganda, with an aspiration of educating her child up to university. She operates a salon, with ten years of experience.  She has a business dream of having a popular beauty parlor in the future.  Christine needs the loan to buy more cosmetics for the salon.

loans.use: Buying cosmetics for the salon

loans.name: Fred

texts.en: Fred is a twenty-six-year-old hardworking man living in a rented house in Fort Portal, Uganda, with a dream of being able to adequately provide basic needs to his family.  He is employed at a health unit and his meager salary has helped him pay school fees, though with challenges of late payments. Fred needs the loan to pay school fees.

loans.use: To pay school fees for his children

loans.name: Jane

texts.en: Jane is a thirty-four-year-old married woman with three children, living in a rented house in Fort Portal, Uganda.  She dreams of owning a family residence in the next four years. She has been operating a drugstore for over three years, and this has helped her to pay school fees for her children,  although she lacks enough capital to buy drugs for sale. Jane intends to use the loan to buy drugs for sale.

loans.use: To stock drugs for sale

loans.name: Hasifa

texts.en:
Hasifa B. is 40 years old and lives in the town of Kireka in the Kampala south region of Uganda.  She is married and has 4 children.  All of her children are currently in school.  Hasifa has a business of stone quarrying, which she has had for over 10 years.         

To help expand her business, Hasifa has requested a loan of 1,500,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda.  The loan will be used to employ more people.  With the help of the loan from BRAC, Hasifa hopes to generate greater profits and pay school fees.  In the future, Hasifa hopes to own a stone quarrying market.

loans.use: To employ workers

loans.name: Sanula

texts.en:
Sanula N. is 47 years old and lives in the town of Kireka in the Kampala south region of Uganda.  She is single and has 4 children.  All of her children are currently in school.  Sanula has a business selling clothes, which she has had for over 10 years.         

To help expand her business, Sanula has requested a loan of 2000,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda.  The loan will be used to purchase more clothes.  With the help of the loan from BRAC, Sanula hopes to generate greater profits and pay school fees.  In the future, Sanula hopes to own a large boutique.

loans.use: To buy clothes to resell

loans.name: Justine

texts.en:
Justine N. is 39 years old and lives in the town of Kireka in the Kampala south region of Uganda.  She is single and has 1 child, who is currently in school.  Justine has a business of a grocery, which she has had for 4 years.         

To help expand her business, Justine has requested a loan of 2000,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda.  The loan will be used to purchase more stock.  With the help of the loan from BRAC, Justine hopes to generate greater profits and pay school fees.  In the future, Justine hopes to own a wholesale shop.

loans.use: To buy stock for grocery store

loans.name: Naava

texts.en:
Naava N. is 45 years old and lives in the town of Kireka in the Kampala south region of Uganda.  She is single and has 4 children.  All of her children are currently in school.  Naava has a business selling tomatoes, which she has had for over 10 years.         

To help expand her business, Naava has requested a loan of 2000,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda.  The loan will be used to purchase more tomatoes.  With the help of the loan from BRAC, Naava hopes to generate greater profits and pay school fees.  In the future, Naava hopes to own a retail shop.

loans.use: To buy tomatoes to sell

loans.name: Tursunbek

texts.en:
Tursunbek J. is a 39-year-old farmer who lives in the Naryn region in the part of Kyrgyzstan with the highest mountains. He has three children: His elder son studies at the university, the second son is the schoolboy and his most beloved daughter is 6 years old. 

He graduated from college and worked as a mechanic at the local farm. In 2004, in order to find means of subsistence, he started his business in cattle-breeding with the initial capital of 5,000 Kyrgyzstan soms (KGS). He worked hard and managed to enlarge the number of livestock to three milk cows, 10 sheep and 10 goats. With the revenues from this activity, Tursunbek was able to pay for an education for his son and buy a used car. His wife helps him in his efforts to provide a good life to his family by selling groceries at the local market. 

Tursunbek plans to use this loan of 125,000 KGS to expand his farm by buying calves and sheep. With the revenues from the loan, he plans to broaden his business by reconstructing a barn for his cattle. In the future, he dreams to build a big house for his family.  

Bai-Tushum and Partners uses Kiva funding to target the especially vulnerable population. Bai-Tushum and Partners is one of the leading microfinance institutions in Kyrgyzstan. As a reliable financial partner, Bai-Tushum contributes to the economic development of the Kyrgyz Republic through the delivery of microfinance services in rural and urban areas that lead to increased employment and meet the interests of its clients and investors.

loans.use: To purchase cattle

loans.name: Marcos Tulio

texts.es:
Marcos Tulio de 43 años de edad es soltero, labora como vigilante para el Hospital de El Rama desde hace 16 años. Esta solicitando  su 9no credito con el objetivo de levantar una pared en su casa que se encuentra en mal estado y asi brindar mayor comodidad a su familia.  

Cabe señalar que sus creditos anteriores los ha utilizado para ir mejorando su casa poco a poco, pues desea  brindaqrle a su familia las mejores condiciones posibles, pues es el patrimonio que les dejara.
texts.en:
Marcos Tulio, 43, is single and has worked as a Watchman at El Rama Hospital for the last 16 years.  He is asking for his 9th loan to erect a wall in his house that’s in poor state thus providing more comfort to his family.

It’s worth mentioning that he used past loans to gradually fix up his house because he wants the best possible conditions for his family since this is the only estate he’ll leave them.

loans.use: To repair a wall.

loans.name: Evelio Antonio

texts.es:
Evelio de 45 años de edad es casado, tiene 2 hijas, la mayor de 18 años y la menor de 17, ambas estudiando la universidad; Evelio labora para la Alcaldia de Juigalpa como responsable de secretaria del campo desde hace 10 años. 

Esta solicitando  su 3er credito con el objetivo de terminar de echarle la ceramica a su casa en Cuapa, pues con el credito anterior solo logro ponerle a una parte, y como se acerca diciembre quiere darle a su familia ese regalo y asi ver bonita su casa. 

Su mayor sueño es que sus hijas culminen su carrera y poder brindarle mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Evelio, 45, is married and has two daughters.  The oldest is 18 and the youngest is 17; both are in the university.  

Evelio has been a City of Juigalpa municipal employee for ten years.

He is asking for his 3rd loan to lay tile in his house in Cuapa.  His previous loan only managed to get part of the job done and because December is approaching he wants to give this gift to his family to see his house be pretty. 

His greatest dream is to see his daughters finish their career and to be able to provide them with better living conditions.

loans.use: To install tile in his house.

loans.name: Ema Raquel

texts.es: La Sra. Ema, comerciante tiene 2 puestos de venta dentro del mercado de la zona en los cuales vende juguetes ropa y cristalerías vende de todo un poco según la temporada, ya hace dos años, conocida en  la zona como por su amabilidad y buen carácter, casada con el sr. Alejandro,  tienen 3 hijos en su poder, es  una persona trabajadora y con muchas ganas de continuar superándose en bien de su familia, el dinero del crédito lo invertida en la compra de juguetes por la temporada navideña  y así poder incrementar su capital de trabajo.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           Esta es la segunda secuencia  de la cliente ya que anteriormente trabajo en banco de emprendimiento y ella muy agradecida con la institución por el apoyo económico que le brinda.
texts.en:
Ema is a merchant.  She has two stalls inside a local market where she sells toys and glassware.  She sells a little bit of everything according to the season.  She’s been in business for two years and is known throughout the zone for her kindness and good character.

She’s married to Alejandro and has three children in her care.  She is a hard working person who very much wants to continue to improve for her family’s benefit.

She will use the loan money to buy toys for the Christmas season thus increasing her working capital.

This is the client’s second sequence since she worked with the communal bank previously.  She is very grateful to the institution for the financial support it provides.

loans.use: To buy toys.

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es: La Sra. Isabel, nacida en la ciudad de Santa Cruz, su actividad es la elaboración y comercialización  de pan,  tiene 2 hijos que se encuentran en edad escolar.  Es una persona trabajadora y responsable en su hogar vive en la casa de su padre, ella corre con los gasto de la casa en la cual esta construyendo dos piezas para tener mayor comodidad, el dinero del crédito lo utilizara en la compra de material de construcción como ser ladrillo, cemento, pintura, esta muy agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Isabel was born in the city of Santa Cruz.  She’s a baker.  She has two school aged children.

She is a hard working, responsible person in her home.  She lives in her father’s house.  She pays household expenses. She is adding on two bedrooms in order to have more comfort.

The money from the loan will be used to buy building materials and supplies like: bricks, cement and paint.  She is very grateful to the institution for the support provided.

loans.use: To buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Dalia

texts.es: La Sra. Dalia es una madre soltera que debido a su situación económica-social se ha tenido que dedicar al servicio del transporte urbano, ya que cuenta con un hijo de 7 años de edad y por lo tanto alguien por quien seguir adelante, doña Dalia vive en casa familiar y cuenta con todo el apoyo de su madre quien es la dueña de casa. Doña Dalia a venido trabajando desde ya hace bastante tiempo en el rubro del transporte y por lo tanto a aprendido a detectar las épocas de bastante movimiento; debido a eso y a cierta mejoras que son necesarias en su vehículo es que ella se acercó a nuestra institución a solicitar un crédito para realizar el mantenimiento de su vehículo y que la ayude a poner a su vehículo al 100% para estas fechas donde el movimiento vehicular aumenta,  por tal motivo no se le negó dicho préstamo, esta muy agradecida con la institución por el apoyo bridado.
texts.en:
Dalia is a single mother.  Due to her socioeconomic situation she has had to go into urban public transportation services.  She has a 7 year old son for whom she strives to get ahead in life.

Dalia lives in a house belonging to a relative and has all the support from her mother who is the owner of the house.

Dalia has been working for a long time now in transportation so she is able to detect times of high usage.  Because of this she has noticed that her vehicle is in need of repairs.  

She approached out institution to request a loan for vehicle maintenance and repair so that it will be back to 100% efficiency during these times when vehicular traffic increases. 

Due to this the loan was not denied.  She is very grateful to the institution for the support provided.

loans.use: For vehicle maintenance.

loans.name: Carlos Nelson

texts.es: El Sr. Carlos, de estado civil soltero, viene trabajando en el oficio hace ya 5 años aproximadamente, de esta manera es que él ha logrado sacar adelante a sus 2 hijas las cuales quedaron a su cargo después de su ruptura matrimonial cuenta el Sr, que fue un duro golpe pero salió adelante por el bienestar de sus hijas, consiente de que será un trabajo duro. El Sr. Carlos ya conocedor del oficio acudió a nosotros a solicitar el  credito debido a que se le hace absolutamente necesario poner a su vehículo al 100% invertira en la reparacion y mantenimiento del vehiculo, ya que estas son fechas donde la demanda aumenta el doble en relación a los otros meses del año. Don Carlos cuenta con un buen historial crediticio, esta muy agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Carlos, who is a single man, has been working as a taxi driver for about 5 years.  In this way he has been providing for his 2 daughters, who were left in his care after the breakup of his marriage.  Carlos says that it was a difficult blow, but he had to keep going for the wellbeing of his daughters, which he knew would be hard work.  Carlos, who is knowledgeable about his line of work, came to us to request a loan to carry out all of the repair and maintenance he needs for his vehicle, since during this time of year there is twice the demand compared to other months of the year.  Carlos has a good credit history, and is very grateful to the institution for the support provided.

loans.use: to maintain and repair his vehicle

loans.name: Everardo Antonio

texts.es: El señor Everardo Antonio R. B. tiene  la edad de 37 años, vive en el Reparto Juan Ramón Padilla, es casado y su esposa trabaja como comerciante de frutas y verduras, ellos tienen 3 hijos adolecentes, que estudian la escuela primaria, el señor es agricultor desde hace mas de 18 años, fue gracias a la reforma agraria que lograron adquirir sus terrenos para la siembra, el cual es uno de sus fuentes de ingresos más importantes, el solicita un préstamo para  la compra de fertilizantes y fungicidas que le permitan un  mantenimiento Fito Sanitario optimo que mejore la producción de las cosechas y garantice un incremento en los niveles de las ventas, esta inversión le permitirá mejores condiciones económicas que favorezcan a sus pequeños hijos y le garantice a futuro los recursos monetarios para el ingreso a la Universidad, para sus carreras profesionales.
texts.en: Mr. Everardo Antonio R. B. is thirty-seven years old and lives in the neighborhood Juan Ramón Padilla. He is married and his wife works as a fruit and vegetable trader. They have three adolescent children that are in primary school. Everardo has been a farmer for more than eighteen years. Thanks to agrarian reform, they were able to acquire the land to farm, which is one of their most important sources of income. He requests a loan to buy fertilizers and fungicides for optimal plant maintenance to improve the production of his harvests and guarantee an increase in the level of sales. This investment will allow him better economic conditions that will favor his small children and guarantee future monetary resources to pay for their entry to  university for their professional careers.

loans.use: Plant Maintenance

loans.name: Patrick

texts.en: Patrick is a 31-year-old married man with four children living in an owned house in Fort Portal, Uganda. His family's dream is to educate his children up to a tertiary institution. He has been operating a cinema hall for two years now and this has greatly developed as he diversified from still photos into movie shows with a business desire to own a modern cinema hall. Patrick intends to use the credit facility to buy DSTV, a generator and a clipper.

loans.use: To purchase DSTV, a generator and a clipper

loans.name: Solomon

texts.en: Solomon is a 30-year-old ambitious, married man with a child. He owns his house in Fort Portal, Uganda. He is a motorcyclist and has been in the transport business for five years now. Over time, he has been able to own a motorcycle in spite of financial constraints. Nonetheless, he longs to own at least four motorcycles for business. Solomon will use the loan to buy a motorcycle.

loans.use: To buy a motorcycle for his transport business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase a motorcycle for his transport business.

loans.name: Solomon

texts.en: Solomon is a 35-year-old hardworking man, married to a farmer with six children living in his own house in Fort Portal, Uganda.  His ambition is to have a model-educated family. He distills alcohol for a living and has been in the business for 15 years now, amidst the challenge of limited capital available to grow the business. Solomon intends to use the credit facility to purchase coffee seeds and bananas to use in alcohol distillation.

loans.use: To purchase bananas and coffee seeds for alcohol distilling.

loans.name: Cosme

texts.es: El señor Cosme A. M., es un hombre adulto de 63 años, es casado y con su esposa se dedica  a la agricultura desde hace 35 años, ellos tiene 6 hijos, mayores de edad, que sobreviven de manera independiente, y tienen sus propios hogares, ellos se han enfrentado a diversos problemas de plagas, que han carcomido las cosechas, fue gracias a la Reforma Agraria que lograron comprar su terreno, es para sus tierras que solicita u préstamo para la compra de fungicidas y fertilizantes, que le permitan un Mantenimiento Fito Sanitario, para erradicar las infecciones de las tierras, que multipliquen la producción, y a futuro puedan Diversificar sus siembras, por otras que se consumen en masa para su mejoría económica que les permita a un corto plazo la mejoría de la infraestructura de su humilde casita para un retiro tranquilo y digno a sus vidas.
texts.en:
Cosme A. M. is 63 years old and married. He and his wife have been farming for 35 years. Their 6 children are grown and are able to support their own homes. 

It was thanks to the Agrarian Reform that Cosme and his wife were able to buy their farm. They have faced numerous problems with agricultural diseases eating away at their harvest. Cosme is requesting a loan for his farm to buy fungicides and fertilizers for phytosanitary maintenance, which will eradicate crop diseases and increase his farm yield. In the future he will diversify his crops to include other cash crops to improve his income, allowing him and his wife to improve their humble little house and ease into a peaceful and well-deserved retirement.

loans.use: Phytosanitary Maintenance.

loans.name: Hawa

texts.en: Hawa is a 33-year-old married woman with four children living in her own house in Fort Portal, Uganda. Her dream is to educate her children to the university level. She has a shop and a hotel and the income generated from these businesses has helped her expand the hotel for the past 11 years. Her desire is to have one of the biggest hotels in town. Hawa needs the loan to buy food items for her hotel.

loans.use: To buy food items for her hotel

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Plant Maintenance

loans.name: Amalia

texts.es: La señora Amalia es una cliente que ya saco tres créditos en la institución la cancelación D. sus créditos fue buena y puntual, es una cliente con buena actitud, ella se dedica a la venta D. ropa D. mujer D. vestido ya sean top blusas faldas y pantalones, la ropa que Compra la cliente es nueva y D. buena calidad, la cliente agarra toda su mercadería  D. una D. las  avenidas muy populares por la venta D. ropa por mayor y barata,  su negocio esta ubicado en la ceja del alto su negocio esta en una galería,  negocio D. la señora Amalia es sacrificado por que ella tiene que venir desD. la ciudad D. la paz hasta la ciudad D. el alto para vender en su negocio aparte que tiene que ir a comprar hasta muy tarD. mercadería, su esposo es chofer propietario D. un radio taxi, los hijos que tiene la pareja ya son mayores y ya son independientes, el crédito será invertido en la compra D. mercadería.
texts.en: Amalia is a client who already took out three loans with the institution. The repayment of her loans went well and was punctual. She is a client with a good attituD.. She sells women's dress clothing including fine blouses, skirts and pants. The clothing she buys is new and of good quality. She gets her merchandise from one of the avenues which are very popular for selling wholesale and inexpensive clothes. Her business is located in a gallery in la Ceja del Alto. She has to make sacrifices for her business because she has to come from the city of La Paz to the city of El Alto to sell her merchandise. AsiD. from that, she can't go buy the merchandise until very late. Her husband is the owner and driver of a Radio Taxi. The couple's children are older and already independent. The loan will be invested in the purchase of merchandise.

loans.use: Investment in the purchase of jackets and blouses by the dozen.

loans.name: María Angelita

texts.es:
La Señora María S. es socia del banco comunal Narancay Bajo, vive en la comunidad que lleva el mismo nombre, esta comunidad se encuentra en las afueras de la ciudad,  su gente se dedica a la agricultura y cría de animales, mucha de su población han encontrado en la ciudad un trabajo para mejorar su economía.
 
La Señora María tiene 32 años, vive en unión libre y tiene 3 hijos  de 12, 10 y 8 años de edad, todos sus hijos estudian en una escuela de la ciudad, su esposo se dedica a la construcción ya que es maestro albañil, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven arrendando.

Doña María es empleada privada, actividad que realiza hace 5 años, labora de lunes a viernes desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 4 de la tarde y en su casa se dedica a cría de animales como: cuyes, gallinas y ganado, animales que son para su consumo y para la venta.
 
Se encuentra en su tercer crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y fue invitada por una vecina quien es socia activa, con el dinero de su crédito va a comprar ganado. Su meta es  terminar su casa ya que se encuentra en construcción.
texts.en:
Maria S. is a member of the community bank Narancay Bajo and lives in a community that bears the same name. This community is located in the outskirts of the city and its people dedicate themselves to agriculture and animal husbandry. Much of its population has found work in the city in order to improve their economy. 

Maria is 32 years old and lives in a common law marriage. She has three children that are 12, 10 and 8 years old. All of her children study in a city school. Her husband works in construction and is a master mason. They do not have their own home so they rent. 

Maria is a private employee which she has been doing for 5 years. She works from Monday to Friday from 8:00 a.m. until 4:00 p.m. and at her home she raises animals such as guinea pigs, chickens and cattle. These animals are for her consumption and for sale. 

This is her third loan with the community bank. She was invited by a neighbor who is an active member of the bank. She will purchase cattle with the money from her loan. Her goal is to finish her home as it is currently under construction.

loans.use: Purchase cattle.

loans.name: María Esther

texts.es:
La Señora María G. es socia del banco comunal Narancay Bajo, vive en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es conocida como  Santa Ana de los cuatro ríos, su centro histórico en diciembre de 1999 fue nombrado patrimonio cultural de la humanidad.
 
Nuestra socia tiene 38 años, es madre soltera de 2 hijas de 15 y 6 años de edad, la primera hija  estudia en el colegio y su segunda en una escuela de la ciudad, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive en casa de su papá  donde comparten los gastos.
 
Doña María es comerciante y se dedica a la venta de hortalizas, frutas, quesillos, etc., actividad que la desempeña hace 20 años, tiene un puesto propio en el mercado de la feria libre, labora de lunes a viernes desde las 9 de la mañana hasta las 6 de la tarde.
 
Este es su primer crédito y fue invitada por su prima a ser socia del  banco comunal,  el dinero de su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de hortalizas y más frutas. Su meta es darles  a sus hijas una buena educación.
texts.en:
Maria G. is a member of the community bank Narancay Bajo. She lives in the city of Cuenca. This city is known as Santa Ana of the four rivers. In December of 1999, its historic center was named a cultural heritage of humanity. 

This member is 38 years old. She is a single mother of two daughters of ages 15 and 6. Her first daughter is in school and her second is in a city school. She does not have her own home which is why she lives at her father's house and they share their expenses. 

Maria is a merchant. She sells vegetables, fruits and cheeses which she has been doing for 20 years. She has her own stall in the free fair market. She works from Monday to Friday, from 9:00 A.M. until 6:00 P.M. 

This is her first loan with the bank. Her cousin invited her to be a member of the community bank. She will use the money from her loan to invest in purchasing vegetables and more fruit. Her goals is to provide her daughters with a good education.

loans.use: Buy fruits and vegetables.
